Further, core competencies  energized the company to offer specialized services to its clients including advisory services, implementation services, and sustenance & enhancement services in the SAP & AWS domains.

Headquartered in Kolkata, India, and having presence in the US, Infocus Technologies brings to the table captive core competencies   gained from  20 years of industry-proven experience. Its managing partners and team members are all seasoned SAP/Cloud professionals. Infocus utilizes the efforts from the team and has been serving to fulfill customer expectations and helping them to achieve their ERP goals leveraging the latest digital framework. It seamlessly handles the digital transformation of clients’ infrastructure, helping unburdening the clients from burning their business acumen and freeing their bandwidth from non productive activities. 

Following standard CMMI Level 3 and ISO 9001:2015 guidelines, Infocus has been successfully satisfying clients growing demands. With the latest improvements and technologies, Infocus delivers world-class consulting services to its clients at local cost through dedicated attention. It assures clients’ cloud adoption to ensure seamless integration with new technologies. Likewise, it promises proper ERP adoption to improve clients’ internal digitally integrated operational processes. This enables clients’ to transform customer experience and gratify their demands. Currently, Infocus Technologies has developed the capabilities to provide the best solution suite advice to customers. It assists them in the adoption, implementation, sustenance, and enhancement/augmentation of S/4HANA, Cross-Platform Migration considering heterogeneous and homogenous scenarios, and cloud adoption.

Further, Infocus offers the wide range of SAP solutions including, SAP Consulting Services, SAP Implementations, SAP Post implementation support, SAP rollouts, additional module implementation, ABAP developments, Basis Support, SAP Integration Technology, SAP Project Consulting and Requirement Analysis, SAP Value Added Module Implementation (CRM, BI & BO, Success Factor, Ariba, Analytics), SAP Technical Upgrade, SAP Functional and Technical testing, SAP transaction entry support, SAP Auditing, SAP Support under both Services Delivery and Time Material Model on off-shore as well as on-shore basis, and AWS Cloud Services like Cloud Migration on-premise and Cloud Maintenance.

Name: Boston University
Description: With colleges and universities thick on the ground in Boston, Boston University (BU) amounts to more than just a hill of beans. Founded as a Methodist seminary in 1839, the private university has more than 33,000 students at its campus on the banks of the Charles River and its Medical Campus. The university offers more than 250 undergraduate, graduate, doctorate, and special degree programs at 17 colleges and schools. BU counts Nobel laureates Elie Wiesel (peace), Derek Walcott (literature), Sheldon Glashow (physics), and Osamu Shimomura (chemistry) among its more than 3,800 faculty members.

Name: IVL Global
Description:
We at IVL are a one-stop destination for businesses looking for the best IT services and IT solutions. We are a global IT Services and Solutions company, providing our clients with a wide range of services like Digital Transformation, Enterprise App Services, Outsourced Product Development, and Testing Centre of Excellence. Our goal is to solve various business problems faced by industries and providing them optimum and effective technology solutions. Our core competency includes Mobility Solutions, Business Analytics, Visualization and Collaboration, and Wireless & IP Communications. With adapting to the state-of-art-technologies, we plan to grow as a trusted brand for digital transformation solutions.

We are a high-octane team of individuals, ready to be seen, to be heard, and ready to make a difference. Our focus is to deliver the best-fit solutions with a firm commitment to quality and customer satisfaction, at the same time ensuring that our employees realize and understand their full potential. We at IVL believe in invisible innovation and are continuously improving the way we work. We explore new ways, dare to take risks, Innovate to meet future business needs, and learn from both our successes and failures.

Name: The Princeton Review
Description:
The Princeton Review is the leader in supporting students on their journeys to fulfill their greatest hopes. We’re about test prep, yes, but we’re also about tutoring, homework help, and admission counseling, all of which allow us to help turn students’ goals into reality. 
We’re friendly, progressive, motivated. Our leadership are down-to-earth experts in the field of education—change-makers and innovators who are developing cutting-edge educational tools. With our groundbreaking, multi-platform content delivery systems, students can study effectively and efficiently however and whenever they want. 
The next wave of leaders, we know, sits in both our classrooms and in our offices. We’re dedicated to fostering a setting where everyone with the creativity, drive, and potential can use their talents. 
Our culture is bomb, too. Happy hour, brunch socials, a guppie named Viper. Good caffeine and snacks. Lots of light. Space to move and thrive. The kind of biz-cas that allows for expression.

Name: RocSearch
Description:
RocSearch is an industry leader in customised business intelligence solutions. For over 21 years we have been creating sustainable advantage for companies using a unique combination of business and financial research with data science.
 
Our critical intelligence and advisory solutions support a loyal global clientele: Fortune 500 Companies, Financial and Professional Services firms, Government bodies and institutions, and SMEs.
 
We consistently deliver competitive advantage, fuel growth and profitability, optimise brand eminence, enhance customer profiling and create opportunities to win deals.

Name: TVS Credit Services
Description:
From the largest cities to the smallest villages, India is filled with ambition and enterprise. As Indians from all walks of life set out to write their growth story, our timely and affordable credit empowers them to bring their dreams alive. 

As part of the $8.5 billion TVS Group, we empower Indians from various socioeconomic backgrounds with financial products that serve their needs. In doing so, we further the cause of financial inclusion. Our two wheeler, used car, three wheeler, and tractor loans are designed for Indians in small towns and the rural heartland, for our nation's growth is powered by their prosperity. Our foray into the used commercial vehicle and consumer durable finance is yet another step in this direction. 

Our entrepreneurial culture, which inspires us to deliver our best, has given rise to such initiatives as TEDDI, a framework to implement innovative ideas, and GURU, a mentorship program to help new employees deliver excellence from Day One. With over 8.4 million customers and a long-term CRISIL rating of AA (Stable), our growth is built on firm foundations. 

We have won several awards, including the Flame Award for Excellence in Rural Marketing, the Best BFSI Company Award at the ET Now Makers of Developed India Awards 2018, and also listed among the Top 40 in India’s leading BFSI companies 2019 by Dun & Bradstreet. 

2010: We begin operations with our Two Wheeler loans 
2010-11: Our book size grows to INR 100 crore 
2012-13: Our book size grows to INR 1000 crore. We begin financing Used Cars and Tractors 
2014-15: We reach the milestone of 1 million customers and begin financing Used Tractors 
2016-17: We welcome our 2 millionth customer 
2017-18: Our book size exceeds INR 6000 crore. We launch our Consumer Durable loans 
2018-19: We begin financing Used Commercial Vehicles Loans and Business Loans

Name: Madewell
Description:
The first Madewell store opened in 2006 with designs inspired by our workwear beginnings but modernized for today. Denim is at the core of everything we do, from great jeans for women and men to all the things to wear with them: tees, tennis shoes, leather jackets and handbags, and more. Madewell is effortless, sexy, cool, tomboy, artful and unexpected.

Whether you’re taking the first step in your career or are a professional looking for an exciting new opportunity, we offer a wide array of challenging and creative roles. We foster a collaborative, community-driven and innovative environment in our stores, home offices, and distribution and call centers. Want in?

Name: Lentra AI
Description:
Lentra is a class-leading digital lending cloud platform that empowers banks to make credit more accessible to everyone. It partners with some of the largest private and public sector banks, as well as multi-finance companies, and has facilitated over US $20 billion in loans on its platform, both secured and unsecured.

Its full-stack solution covers the entire lending process, from digital origination and onboarding to verification, validation, credit decisioning, and loan management. This seamless and secure digital lending experience is transforming the industry.

Founded in 2019, Lentra is one of India's fastest-growing enterprise SaaS companies, achieving a remarkable 20x growth in just four years. The company is backed by prominent investors such as BVP, SIG, HDFC Bank, and Citi Ventures, and raised $60 million in a series B funding round in November 2022.

Name: Sinch
Description:
We started as six people in Stockholm with a mission to bring businesses and people closer together.  Now, we’re a growing global organization that helps amazing companies engage with customers on their mobile phones. 

We reach every phone on the planet. For our Sinchers that means working in an environment that offers an incredible variety of exciting challenges, and the chance to impact how billions of people engage with their favorite brands. 

We're a worldwide group of people, committed to diversity. We're learning how to offer an increasingly inclusive workplace wherever you are.  And because we believe that offering equal opportunity is key to our success, no matter who our people are, they’ll be able to explore new career and growth options - whether that’s building on their skills, trying something new, or exploring new horizons.

Name: New York Times
Description: "All the News That's Fit to Print and Post Online" would be a more accurate motto for this media titan. The New York Times Company (The Times Co.) publishes The New York Times, one of the world's most respected newspapers boasting a circulation of about 900,000. It also owns The Boston Globe and the Worcester Telegram & Gazette (Massachusetts). Subsidiary International Herald Tribune, meanwhile, publishes its eponymous newspaper for English readers in 180 countries. The Times Co. distributes news online through NYTimes.com and other sites, and it owns online content portal About Group. Chairman Arthur Sulzberger and his family control the company through a trust.

Name: Anheuser-Busch
Description:
Anheuser-Busch always dreams big.​ It’s our culture and our heritage.​ But more than that, it’s our future. A future where we always serve up new ways to meet life’s moments and the times that matter. The moments where we celebrate, defy challenges, dream of the brighter future we are building today– and all the moments in between.

We embody the time-honored traditions of brewing great beer while constantly innovating to drive the industry forward. We strive for excellence in everything we do. We are home to iconic, beloved brands. And we are leading the industry into the future by growing beyond beer to offer new beverages for every person, for every occasion.

We invest time in making a meaningful impact. We are business partners, collaborators and community leaders working to make a difference around the globe to better our future. We create jobs. We show up to lift up our neighbors when natural disasters strike. We remain unwavering in our advocacy for responsible drinking. We put sustainable innovation at the center of our business by reducing our use of precious natural resources, and continuously striving to leave our world a cleaner place. And every time we brew, we use the highest-quality ingredients, grown in America by farmers who have been our partners for generations.

We are building a business for the future. A future where we keep dreaming bigger.​ To provide opportunity for our 19,000 colleagues.​ To lift up our neighbors. To create a future that everyone can celebrate, and everyone can share in.

A future with more cheers.

Name: Sella
Description:
We want shape the financial ecosystem of the future where people can realize their aspirations.

We are an open company that has always seen innovation as the cornerstone to win future challenges. We have an entrepreneurial history of independence based on the corporate values of responsibility, love for the customer, passion and meritocracy.

Today we work to establish our identity as an Italian company able to be internationally competitive, able to contribute to the economic and social development of the territories in which it operates and helping its customers to succeed.

Name: Helm360
Description:
Helm360 is a division of California Creative Solutions, Inc. Established as a global technology company in 1997, Helm360 has gained extensive expertise in business intelligence and analytics. With multiple locations across the globe and 350+ employees, Helm360 offers solutions and professional services that address customer needs for Business Intelligence (BI), Compliance, Analytics, Predictive Analytics, Data Mining and Analysis, Dashboards and Reporting, Microsoft SharePoint, Thomson Reuters Elite 3E, Thomson Reuters Elite Enterprise, Thomson Reuters Elite Design Gallery, Thomson Reuters ProLaw, Mobile Applications, and System-to-System Integrations. After many years of providing technical expertise to the legal industry, Helm360 created “Terminus”, a line of reporting and business intelligence solutions tailored for law firms.

At Helm360 our customer-centric approach and commitment to providing the best solutions to our customers is what differentiates us in the market. Offering innovative technology solutions, we are passionate about solving customer’s problems. We believe in clear and honest communication in order to ensure our customer’s needs are met and that we deliver the best solution in the most dynamic way.

Name: Sigma
Description: Cold food makes Sigma Alimentos hot stuff. The company is one of Mexico's top producers of refrigerated and frozen foods. Sigma sells its processed meat, cheese, yogurt, and frozen prepared meals in traditional corner stores and modern supermarkets throughout the country. Its brands include El Cazo Mexicano, Fud, and Del Prado. Sigma, the food division of conglomerate Alfa, has exclusive rights to distribute ConAgra Banquet brand frozen foods and General Mills' Yoplait yogurt in Mexico. The company also owns the US's Bar-S Foods. Its products are also available in the Caribbean, Central America, and the US. Sigma operates from locations in Costa Rica, Guatemala, El Salvador, Mexico, and the US.

Name: Keste
Loction: 6100 W Plano Pkwy # 1800 Plano, Texas, 75093-8230, United States

Name: Swatch Group
Description:
The Swatch Group Ltd. is a diversified multinational holding company active in the manufacture and sale of finished watches, jewelry, watch movements and components. It is the world’s largest watchmaking group, and supplies nearly all the components required for the watches sold by its eighteen individual brands and the multi-brand retail companies Tourbillon and Hour Passion. 

The Swatch Group Ltd. was founded in 1983, by Nicolas G. Hayek. Originally known as SMH, it was created out of the merger of two Swiss watch companies. The Swatch Group Ltd. in Biel (Switzerland) is today the largest manufacture of finished watches in the world. 

Its production companies supply movements and components to third-party watchmakers in Switzerland and around the world. Swatch Group is a key player in the manufacture and sale of electronic systems used in watchmaking and other industries. It is also a leader in the field of sports event timing.

Name: MicroStrategy
Description:
Can you keep pace? 

MicroStrategy (Nasdaq: MSTR) is a leading global provider of enterprise software platforms. For over thirty years, we’ve provided world-class software platforms and expert services to our customers. Through our actionable intelligence, we help our clients – including Boston Children’s Hospital, Lidl-Stiftung, LG Electronics, and so many others – unleash their exponential potential. And our employees – smart, quick, resilient – make it all possible.

Name: Deftsoft Informatics
Description:
Live Deftsoft Informatics (P) Ltd. is a 100% export oriented unit (EOU) registered with the Software Technology Parks of India (STPI), with a flagship office based in Colorado, USA. Our objective is to encourage, promote and boost Software Exports from India. Our strong commitment towards a responsible business practice reflects in everything we do - from the transparency of our communication and work with stakeholders to the unique benefits we offer to our employees and our clients.

Deftsoft provides an equal opportunity to everyone with an environment that allows them to grow and learn. Our unique and simple work culture endorses creativity and teamwork, and also encourages our employees to keep up a healthy work and life balance. We frequently update our employees with new technologies that can help them to learn more. We develop distinctive and exceptional solutions that help our clients to take complete control over online business in real time.

Name: Oportun
Description: Oportun (Nasdaq: OPRT) is a digital banking platform that puts its 1.9 million members’ financial goals within reach. With intelligent borrowing, savings, budgeting, and spending capabilities, Oportun empowers members with the confidence to build a better financial future. Since inception, Oportun has provided more than $14.7 billion in responsible and affordable credit, saved its members more than $2.3 billion in interest and fees, and helped our neobanking members save an average of more than $1,800 annually. For more information, visit Oportun.com.

Name: Cuelogic Technologies
Description:
Cuelogic Technologies is a global company providing technology and engineering services to companies worldwide. Cuelogic offers offshore product development and technology services in niche areas like Web Applications, Mobile Applications, Cloud Computing and Advanced Testing Solutions for Enterprise and Consumer Software. Cuelogic also helps companies boost their in-house team’s capacity and capabilities by providing engineers and designers for temporary and long term assignments. The company has been trusted partner for product companies and world-class startups for many years now.

We have our offices in New York, California and our centre of excellence is based out of Pune, India.

We are focused on the following technologies:
Python, Django, Golang, Ruby on Rails, PHP, NodeJS, JavaScript, AngularJS, Backbone.js, React.js, HTML5, D3, Scala, Java, .Net, Big-Data, DevOps, Mobile (iOS, Android, Blackberry, Windows, PhoneGap), MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB.

Name: Appiness Interactive
Description:
We are a Bangalore based Product Development and UX firm specialising in Digital Services for the whole spectrum, from startups to fortune-500s. We do not redefine anything or reinvent the wheel.

We work closely with startups to create their product and help them of the ground, and continue support in scaling up strategies and technologies. For our bluechip clients, we bring to the table, our vast experience in bleeding-edge technology and pleasurable UX.

We create a comprehensive soul for a brand in the online world. We create digital products that infiltrates the public realm and engage the target customers of our clients, all over the globe, through the multiple platforms of Digital Media, including web, mobile and wearables.

Name: BBVA
Description:
BBVA is a global company with more than 160 years of history that operates in more than 25 countries where we serve more than 80.1 million customers. We are more than 113,000 professionals working in multidisciplinary teams with profiles as diverse as financiers, legal experts, data scientists, developers, engineers and designers,
engineers and designers.

BBVA CIB encompasses investment banking, market activities, loans and transactional services for international corporate clients and institutional investors, with an extensive network of financial experts, investment-banking specialists and advisers in specific industries and sectors. 
Clients can access a wide range of value-added products and solutions to cover everything from the simplest to the most complex requirements, while enjoying support in project management in order to reach local and international business goals, and transform for a more digital, sustainable future.

Name: Questionpro
Description: With over 3 million users across 40 countries, QuestionPro is the Global leader in online survey software that allows our users to create, send and analyse surveys to generate powerful insights to make data-oriented business decisions. Our software also enables users to conduct polls, mobile device based research, capture data offline and utilize automated data visualizations and analytics in realtime. We have provided reliable and innovative technology to over 15,000 businesses Worldwide including Fortune 500 & 100 companies, academic institutions, small businesses, and individual DIY researchers for over ten years.

Name: Appitsimple
Description:
Company Name: AppItSimple Infotek Pvt Ltd

Headquartered in Ahmedabad, Appitsimple is better known for its innovative “Digital Products” - SoftwareSuggest and CallHippo. It is an IT company that has been revolutionizing & simplifying the way organizations do business since Jan 2014.


We are a growing team of 200+ professional experts coming from diverse backgrounds who have keen expertise in dealing with Digital Products. A flexible work environment, high level of empowerment, involvement in company’s business decisions, leadership development through mentoring, skills development initiatives are the big takeaways at AppItSimple Infotek.


1. SoftwareSuggest

·         First of its kind, SoftwareSuggest is a pre-eminent, privately held largest software discovery and recommendation platform in India.

 

·         SoftwareSuggest list, review, compare business software and offer free consultation to its customers.

 

·         SoftwareSuggest Drives a monthly traffic of more than 2,75,000 and generates more than 6000 leads a month.


·         SoftwareSuggest clients are some of the biggest name in the India’s software market – Tally, MARG, GreytHR etc. We are not limited to national boundaries, our International clients includes ZOHO, BambooHR, FreshBooks etc.

 

·         SoftwareSuggest have helped 116839 business to find the right software. Some of our happy customers are BookmyShow, Patanjali, Airtel, Shopper Stop etc.

 

 	URL : https://www.softwaresuggest.com/

2. Product Name- CallHippo
·         CallHippo is a soft Phone solution that will get you virtual Number for more than 190+ countries in 3 simple steps and within 3 minutes.

·         It has a huge International Presence with our customers present in more than 100 countries. 85% of CallHippo customers are International.

·         It was launched in 2017 and in a very short span has 1500+ well established companies using its Telephone services. Paytm, DealSuite, Skyscanner, Griiip etc. are some of  our happy customers of CallHippo.

Name: ShoreTel
Description:
ShoreTel is now Mitel!
Powering more than 2 billion connections every day, Mitel (NASDAQ: MITL; TSX: MNW) helps businesses connect, collaborate and take care of their customers. That includes more than 33 million cloud connections daily, making Mitel the world’s fastest growing provider of cloud communications. Our business communications experts serve more than 60 million users with over 2500 channel partners in more than 100 countries. We have #1 market share in EMEA and have been identified by top industry analyst firms as a business communications leader. For more information, go to www.mitel.com and follow us on Twitter @Mitel

Name: Silicus Technologies
Description:
Silicus is a cloud transformation services company, focused on delivering technology that enables customers to innovate, deploy competitive advantage at scale, standardize and automate to reduce complexity and risk from operations, and drive intelligence for business strategy and operational improvements. Our global team  works closely with customers to achieve these goals, by providing cloud technology services for software & DevOps, infrastructure modernization, data analytics, connected IoT solutions, and AI-enabled processes with people-machine interactions. We are constantly updating and upgrading ourselves, to better serve our customers. 

At Silicus, every voice is heard, the best ideas win, and talent trumps tenure. Our teams blend proven technology experts with trailblazing talent and provide team members with unlimited opportunities to accelerate their careers and expand their skill sets by learning, engaging, and mastering emerging technologies. Come, join the experience!

Name: Snap-on
Description: Snap-on understands the mechanics of the automotive repair business. The company is a leading manufacturer and distributor of high-quality hand tools, as well as auto diagnostic equipment and "under-car" shop implements, such as hydraulic lifts and tire changers. Snap-on has built a business serving mechanics, car makers, and government and industrial organizations. Other products -- with brand names Snap-on, Blackhawk, Lindström, ShopKey, and Sun -- include collision repair equipment, management software, roll cabinets, tool chests, wheel balancers, and wrenches. Snap-on operates finance subsidiaries in international markets where it has franchises.

Name: Arise
Description:
Arise is a pioneer of on-demand customer management business process outsourcing solutions, headquartered in Florida. Through the cloud-based Arise Platform, Fortune 50 and other companies connect to Service Partners who deliver authentic, loyalty-building interactions with their customers. Delivering radical flexibility to meet even extreme contact volume fluctuations, the Arise Platform is an innovative alternative to the traditional contact center, where brand champions support the brands they love, driving higher client and customer satisfaction. Named a top employer by the Sun Sentinel for 5 years in a row, and recently acquired by one of the largest and most respected Private Equity Firms in the world, Warburg Pincus, now is the time to join Arise. 

To learn more about how Arise Virtual Solutions can help you, please visit www.arise.com.

Name: Dew Solutions
Description:
Dew Solutions is an end-to-end digital product design and development company focused on strategic planning, digital user experience journeys, visual communication design, development for web and mobile apps.

We develop digital products that not only cater to our client’s strategic goals but also delight the users. From startups to enterprise solutions, we support our clients through open collaboration, design thinking for better user experience, engaging design and cross-platform development for both web and mobile.

Name: OneDirect (India)
Description: OneDirect is India’s largest Customer Experience Management Company. Our goal is to empower enterprises to create personalized and delightful customer experiences across all digital touchpoints. Built for enterprises, our suite of world-class products and services are at the confluence of Service, Feedback, Messaging, Big Data, and Cloud.

Name: Dialpad
Description: Dialpad is a cloud-based business phone system that turns conversations into opportunities and helps global teams make smarter calls--anywhere, anytime. All products are powered by Voice Intelligence, Dialpad's proprietary technology that helps companies unlock conversation insights, improve productivity and drive better performance across teams.

Name: Juego Studios
Description: Juego Studio is a leading game design and development service providing company.

Name: Fugro
Description: Geological engineering company Fugro helps the oil and gas, mining, and construction industries stay in touch with what lies beneath through three operating divisions. Its Survey unit offers geophysical surveys, inspection services, oceanographic mapping, aerial photography, and global positioning services. Fugro's Geotechnical division provides design and construction services, including pavement engineering, pipeline engineering, drilling, materials testing, structural monitoring, and foundation analysis and modeling, and primarily serves the oil and gas industry. Its Geosciences operations provide seismic and gravity surveys, reservoir services, and airborne mineral and petroleum exploration.

Name: Ziff Davis Performance Marketing
Loction: Viman Nagar Upper Ground Floor, Block B, Weikfield IT Citi Info Park
Description:
About ZDPM
ZDPM is the coming together of Salesify and DemandShore. Collectively, we’ve been in the B2B Tech Performance Marketing business since 2004. Our years of experience, both in terms of people as well as processes are unparalleled in the industry today.
We are part of Ziff Davis . We are listed on the Nasdaq (symbol : ZD) with a market cap of USD 3.7 Billion. We are also a Great Place to Work-Certified™ Company.

Culture
The culture at ZDPM is an amalgamation of two very strong and yet diverse entrepreneur-led organizations, as well as the organizational maturity brought in by the multi-billion dollar Ziff Davis Group. Our mission is to retain the best of three worlds. The aggression & Drive which was the inherent DNA of Salesify, the Passion for Innovation, Quality and Customer Centricity from Demandshore, and the  process maturity, discipline & controls from ZIff Davis.

Name: RiseSmart
Description:
Randstad RiseSmart is a leading specialist in worklife coaching and career transitions and an operating company of Randstad N.V. Our purpose is to enable organizations to unleash possibilities throughout their working lives for their biggest asset, their people. We understand that a business thrives when its people do. 

Our coaching-centric approach is designed to support individuals throughout all stages of their employment, and to support businesses in onboarding, developing, mobilizing, engaging, retaining, and transitioning employees to have the best possible worklife experience in alignment with business needs. We do this through our industry-leading combination of ‘tech and touch’ resources such as expert coaching, field expertise, industry insights, curated content, specialist platforms, and personalized action plans. 

Visit us at: www.randstadrisesmart.com

Name: Doyensys
Description:
Doyensys is a Management & Technology Consulting company with expertise in Enterprise applications – Oracle and Service now. We help clients to harness the power of innovation to thrive on change. The company’s technology expertise, global talent and extensive industry experience combine to deliver powerful next-generation IT services and solutions. 

For more information on Doyensys visit www.doyensys.com or email info@doyensys.com.

Name: Nabler Web Solutions
Description:
Nabler Ranked #23 - Great Mid-size Workplaces 2021.

We are the digital analytics consulting company. We help enterprises and media agencies analyze digital data to understand customer behaviour and enable revenue driving decisions. 

Founded in 2004, with offices in Charlotte, Bangalore and Singapore - we advise some of the top 100 global brands and Fortune 500 firms. We enable marketers to take advanced data-driven decisions and boost the effectiveness and success of their digital properties.

Name: Nando's UK & IRE
Description:
PERi-PERi is the heart and soul of Nando’s. Its story is our story. For centuries the people of Southeast Africa have used PERi-PERi to bring fire to their food. It is in Mozambique’s rich soil and blistering sunshine that the African Bird’s Eye Chilli grows into its fiery best. When Portuguese explorers arrived there, they were enchanted by its flavour. They added a squeeze of lemon and a kick of garlic and turned PERi-PERi into a very well-travelled spice. Which is how, many years later it ended up in Rosettenville, Johannesburg.

One afternoon in 1987, two friends went for lunch at a humble Portuguese eatery. As their meal drew to a close, they knew they’d tasted something that had to be shared. PERi-PERi was about to make one more journey – from Rosettenville to the world.

Name: Six Flags
Description: Six Flags Entertainment Corporation is the world’s largest regional theme park company with $1.2 billion in revenue and 18 parks across North America. The company operates 16 parks in the United States, one in Mexico City and one in Montreal, Canada. For more than 53 years, Six Flags has entertained millions of families with world-class coasters, themed rides, thrilling water parks and unique attractions including up-close animal encounters, Fright Fest® and Holiday in the Park®.

Name: Qvantel
Description:
Qvantel Ltd, the leader of the BSS private cloud, is a fast growing Finnish IT services company that offers cloud-based, critical business support systems (BSS) and IT consulting services. Qvantel's customised BSS private cloud services help telecom operators to achieve maximum business efficiency and to stand out from the competition by helping to provide excellent customer experiences.Qvantel - Changing the game for you.The company has offices in Finland in Helsinki, Tampere, Jyvaskyla and Oulu; in Tallinn, Estonia; in Madrid, Spain; in Karlskrona, Sweden as well as in Hyderabad, India 
In 2016, Qvantel further stepped up its global presence by opening an office in the USA that will serve the fast growing telecommunications market in the region. 

Today Qvantel Group employs  800+ professionals in Finland, India, Sweden, USA, Estonia, and Spain.

Name: TechTree IT Systems
Description:
A team of Tech-savants, we simplify complexities in the technology realm.

We design, build, and grow products / solutions for enterprise, mobile, analytics, cloud and security.

We are constantly dabbling with the n+1 that is yet to unravel. Our experienced team knows how to maximise and future-proof your current technology investments. Our battle hardened consulting team knows how to squeeze out the last bit from your legacy investments. We are that “Partner of Choice” in your digital journey.

Name: Commonfloor
Description:
Passionate about simplifying property decisions, we at Commonfloor.com offer home seekers, sellers and real estate professionals an extensive online real estate ecosystem.  This ecosystem combines at a single stop
•	Exhaustive search options
•	Easy to use analytics
•	Apartment and locality reviews 
•	A comprehensive and verified data base 
•	Apartment community management tools 

As a user you have all conceivable property details for over 1.5 lakh active listing across 120 cities at your fingertips.

Apart from our robust search mechanism we also maintain a vast repository of research on a host of property related matters. We offer in-depth insights on several property aspects ranging from legal issues to maintenance to facility management to home insurance among many others.

With over 50 lakh monthly online visits and 60,000 apartments deploying our Apartment Management system, commonfloor.com aims at adding value to each and every property pursuit.

Name: Integral Ad Science
Description: Integral Ad Science (IAS) is a global leader in digital ad verification, ensuring that ads are viewable by real people in safe and suitable environments. IAS’s mission is to be the global benchmark for trust and transparency in digital media quality for the world’s leading brands, publishers and platforms. We do this through data-driven technologies with actionable real-time signals and insight. Founded in 2009 and headquartered in New York, IAS works with thousands of top advertisers and premium publishers worldwide. IAS is part of the Vista Equity Partners portfolio of companies. For more information, visit integralads.com.

Name: MediaKind
Description:
LIVE Without Limits: Streaming at Scale

MediaKind delivers the technology and expertise that continues to shape and lead the future of global media and entertainment.

We are trusted by the world’s leading service providers, operators, content owners, and broadcasters to respond to the demanding expectations of their viewers. From major sporting moments to breaking world news, we have always been a catalyst for live television. Today, our focus is to inspire and push the boundaries of the streaming era, realizing a future where live can be delivered without limits, at broadcast quality and scale, to any screen or device.

Our software-centric, cloud-native solutions enable high-quality media experiences that are accessible to all across linear, on-demand, and OTT services. We are fueled by more than 30 years of Emmy award-winning technology, spanning contribution and direct-to-consumer videos service distribution; advertising and content personalization; high-efficiency cloud DVR; and TV Platforms.

At MediaKind, everyone is encouraged to excel. For us, diversity and inclusion go beyond standard parameters to ensure we have the right person for the right job.

Name: Teachnook
Loction: 167, 9th Main Rd, near to Empire Restaurant, Sector 6, HSR Layout, Bengaluru, Karnataka
Description:
Teachnook, is turning out to be a headturner in the field of skill development for students.True to its name,it’s the corner with stairwell to your dreams. We are a team of motivated individuals driven with a sole mission to help students become industry ready .We believe that every student has a different set of skills depending on their interests ,natural abilities and experiences. Possessing right set of skills not only facilitates in professional growth and providing competitive edge but also results in higher productivity.

We are a comprehensive e-learning program with a carefully curated curriculum which help students develop skills right from scratch and in advancing their career through guidance from industry experts who are passionate about that field and discover skills that are in demand. Our aim is to provide students with an ace up their sleeves in today’s cut-throat world with flexible ,virtual courses designed to explore various domains ,and fostering personal as well as professional skills through engaging in different group activities.

Name: J D Wetherspoon
Description:
JD Wetherspoon is a leading pub operator in the UK and Ireland. 

Founder Chairman, Tim Martin opened the very first ‘Wetherspoon’, in Muswell Hill, north London, back in 1979. 

Today, Tim and the company run over 850 pubs and hotels, spread right across the UK and Ireland. During this 40-year history, the company has repeatedly led the way with ground-breaking initiatives, picked up hundreds of awards (covering all aspects of pub life) and grown from a handful of staff to over 37,000 employees. 

J D Wetherspoon is regarded as one of the UK’s top employers and has been recognised by the Top Employers Institute as a ‘Top Employer United Kingdom’ for 16 consecutive years, including 2019.

Name: TP Vision
Description:
TP Vision is a dedicated company in the world of visual digital entertainment; fully committed to the renowned Philips TV brand.

TP Vision engages in developing, manufacturing and marketing Philips branded TV sets in Europe, Russia, Middle East, Brazil, Argentina, Uruguay, Paraguay and selected countries in Asia-Pacific excluding China. See locations for more information.

We do this by combining our design expertise and innovative Philips TV heritage with the operational excellence, flexibility and speed of TPV. With these combined strengths, we bring high-quality TV sets to the market: smart and easy to use with sophisticated styling. We believe in creating products that touch the human senses and are within reach of all consumers in the markets we operate in.

Name: Path Infotech
Description:
Path is a Technology Solutions Company offering foundational, sustenance, and digital transformation services across multiple technologies to global businesses.

We provide a blend of industry domain and function-specific solutions and services on Multi-Cloud, Mobility, Analytics, Enterprise Technology, Platform and Application Management, and Cross-Platform Integration.

Our offerings drive business effectiveness and efficiency while striving for innovation, flexibility, and integration with technology. Our ISO 9001 and ISO 27001 certifications and appraisal at CMMI Maturity Level 3 – reflect our strong core values and business ethics.

With our offices in the US, Australia, Singapore, and India, we maintain the right balance of on-shore client engagement and off-shore delivery and cost efficiencies.

Achievements
•	Impeccable track record of successful implementations 
•	Customer loyalty and retention
•	Continual investment in building capabilities and solution
•	Numerous Awards as Best-in-Class Solutions Provider
•	Oracle Partner | Microsoft Partner | AWS Partner	
•	Location: Noida (HQ), Mumbai – India | Singapore | U.S. |Australia

Name: Snap-on Business Solutions
Loction: 4025 Kinross Lakes Pkwy Richfield, Ohio, 44286-9371, United States

Name: Enzigma
Loction: Enzigma HQ2, Suite # 104, Enzigma HQ2 Lane, Off Baner Road,
Description:
Started in 2002 as a technology company working in latest technologies at all times. We are pioneers in adopting and introducing many latest technologies in India. We were one of the very first companies to work on Salesforce from India and we have been working on Salesforce since 2005. As per latest trends we started working on technologies like NodeJS, Angular, Kubernetes, Docker.

Most our clients are based in US. With our unique experience of various technology and talented employees who wish to work on multiple technologies, we could cater to small to large size clients in various domains and technologies.

With tech savvy management, we always adopt new technologies, and expect the same with all the employees.

Name: Grainger
Description:
Grainger is a leading broad line distributor with operations primarily in North America, Japan and the United Kingdom. We achieve our purpose, We Keep the World Working®, by serving more than 4.5 million customers worldwide with innovative technology and deep customer relationships. Grainger offers more than 2 million maintenance, repair and operating (MRO) products and several services, such as technical support and inventory management.

We're proud of our people-focused culture that's been active for more than 95 years. We have a welcoming workplace where you can build a career for yourself while fulfilling our purpose to keep the world working.

We embrace new ways of thinking and recognize everyone as an individual. We lead diversity, equity and inclusion from the top as more than 30% of our board and executive leadership are women and more than 30% are racially diverse.

We’re looking for passionate people to join our 24,000 team members worldwide and move our company forward. Find your way with Grainger at jobs.grainger.com.

Name: Aviva Life Insurance India
Description: Aviva Life Insurance Company India is more India than Aviva. Although it is listed as a joint venture between UK insurance giant Aviva and India-based Dabur, the company's Indian parent -- which owns a collection of health care, personal care, and food concerns -- holds 74% of the company. Aviva Life Insurance Company India (Aviva India) offers a variety of life insurance and investment products under the Aviva brand name, as well as financial planning services. It sells its products through a network of some 225 branch locations and a direct sales force. It also distributes its products through partnerships with Indian bank branches.

Name: Buck
Description: Buck is an integrated HR consulting, benefits administration, and technology services provider. Headquartered in New York, with global operations, Buck is focused on helping its clients realize the best organizational performance for their business while driving positive health, wealth, and career outcomes for their people.

Name: Endress+Hauser Gruppe
Description: Automation is instrumental to Endress + Hauser Holding's measured success. The family-owned company makes instrumentation and measurement systems that monitor flow, pressure, and temperature. Customers use its equipment for various applications, including food, chemical, water, and petroleum production. Along with its products, the company offers consulting, training, and repair services. The company operates through more than 30 locations throughout the world. Three-fifths of sales are in Europe. Endress + Hauser was founded in 1953 by engineer Georg H. Endress and banker Ludwig Hauser. The Endress family has had sole ownership of the company since 1975.

Name: AArete
Description: AArete is a global management consulting firm driving client value through strategic profitability improvement, data-driven solutions and market intelligence. We work across all industries and business functions to optimize profits in a compressed timeframe. AArete humanizes data by translating numbers into actionable insights, helping our clients make better decisions and working by their side to foster change with confidence, empathy and purpose.

Name: Crestech Software
Description:
All that we do is to deliver happy experiences for our clients and team with our quality Software Testing services.

16 years in business, 1600 successful projects, 400 customers and a team of 200 good people.

We have built our legacy on the foundation of positive experiences and customer satisfaction. So much so that now our identity is a reflection of the same. A smile that spreads more smiles.

Name: Bilfinger
Description: Bilfinger is a leading international industrial services provider. The Group enhances the efficiency of assets, ensures a high level of availability and reduces maintenance costs. The portfolio covers the entire value chain from consulting, engineering, manufacturing, assembly, maintenance, plant expansion as well as turnarounds and also includes environmental technologies and digital applications.

Name: Metropolis
Description:
Metropolis Healthcare Limited is a leading diagnostics company in India with a widespread presence in 20 states ; 200+ cities. Instituted in 1981, we expanded our global footprint with presence in Sri Lanka, Kenya, Ghana, Mauritius, Zambia & Uganda.  

Over the last 40+ years, Metropolis has been touching millions of lives each year through its range of 4000+ tests and profiles. These tests and profiles are used for prediction, early detection, diagnostic screening, confirmation and/or monitoring of the disease.  

Our dedication to quality and accuracy in each test is demonstrated by its steady CAP proficiency score of more than 98% over the last decade.

Empowered by our robust network of over 171 labs, 3134 collection centres and 12000+ patient touch points, Metropolis offers analytical and support services to clinical research organisations for their clinical research projects. 

Our philosophy: Putting our patients first: Delivering reliable pathology reports. 

Guided by our core values and backed by our scientific capabilities, Metropolis plays a pivotal role in raising the bar of diagnostic accuracy, technological equipment, customer experience and research-driven empathetic service in the industry.

Name: Fitch Ratings
Description:
Fitch Ratings is a leading provider of credit ratings, commentary and research. Dedicated to providing value beyond the rating through independent and prospective credit opinions, Fitch Ratings offers global perspectives shaped by strong local market experience and credit market expertise. The additional context, perspective and insights we provide help investors to make important credit judgments with confidence.

Fitch Group is a global leader in financial information services with operations in more than 30 countries. In addition to Fitch Ratings, the group includes Fitch Solutions, a leading provider of credit market data, analytical tools and risk services; Fitch Learning, a provider of learning and development solutions for the global financial services industry; and BMI Research, a provider of country risk and industry analysis specializing in emerging and frontier markets. Fitch Group is majority-owned by Hearst.

Name: APCO Worldwide
Description:
APCO Worldwide is an advisory and advocacy communications consultancy. We partner with public and private sector organizations to help them catalyze progress, act with agility and build organizational reputations, brands, relationships and solutions to succeed. APCO is an independent and majority women-owned business.

What we do: 
• Corporate advisory and management consulting
• Corporate, executive, investor and internal communication 
• Crisis, litigation and issue management 
• Media relations and training
• Government relations 
• Litigation communication 
• Market entry 
• Research and measurement
• Strategic philanthropy 
• Digital communication 
• Creative strategy and production
• Coalition building
• Public relations and event management

We work for corporations, industry associations, governments and nonprofit organizations around the world, regardless of where our colleagues are based.

Name: Manipal Global Education Services
Description:
Manipal Global Education Services, also known as Manipal Education, is a leading international provider of high-quality higher education services. These include:

- A wide range of services for educational institutions in India
- Corporate training programs in partnership with major banks and other institutions
- Vocational training across a number of sectors
- Technology-driven services in areas such as testing and education delivery

Headquartered in Bangalore, India, Manipal Global also owns and operates university campuses in Malaysia, Antigua, Dubai and Nepal. It currently offers services and support to over 400,000 students, many of them through its award-winning technology platform, EduNxt™.

Other strategic investments include MeritTrac, India´s leading testing & assessment company, and iRize, a unique employment exchange initiative in partnership with educational institutions, local partners and the government.

Name: Global
Description:
Home to some of the UK's best-loved radio stations such as Heart, Capital and Classic FM, to name a few, we keep 23 million* listeners tuned in and entertained each week.

And that's just for starters; we also manage some of the best musical talent around, publish some of the biggest tracks in the charts, and run two of the freshest music TV channels there are. 

Simply put, we're obsessed with radio, music and entertainment - welcome to our world.

*Source: RAJAR / Ipsos - MORI / RSMB period ending 28th June 2015

Name: EE
Description:
EE, the UK’s most advanced digital communications company, is the first in Britain to offer superfast 4G mobile services alongside fibre broadband. We run EE, Orange and T-Mobile plans, delivering over 27 million customers the best network and the best service so they trust us with their digital lives. 

In fact, EE has Britain's overall biggest and fastest mobile network. It's so good that readers of Mobile Choice magazine awarded it best network in the UK.

Name: Intuitive Technology Partners
Description:
Intuitive.Cloud is one of the fastest-growing Cloud & SDx solution and services companies across the Americas and EMEA supporting global enterprise customers. 

Intuitive.Cloud is an Engineering Company Delivering Cloud Excellent. We drive success through measurable business outcomes.

Intuitive Superpowers:
- DataOps, Databases, Data Warehouse, Data Lake, AI/ML
- Cloud (Public/Hybrid) Adoption/Migration & Transformation
- Cloud Security, GRC and Cost Management
- Cloud FinOps; Cost Optimization
- Application Modernization/Containers/K8s-as-a-Service
- DevSecOps & Site Reliability Engineering
- Hybrid Cloud & SDDC (VMConAWS, AVS, GVE, VMware Cloud Foundation)
- SaaS, IaaS, PaaS and Modern Data Center Application Deployment
- SD-WAN, SDN, DFW, Net/Sec/Wireless

Intuitive Accreditation:
- AWS Advanced Consulting, Well Architected, & ProServe Partner - Global
- Microsoft Solution Designation Partner & Azure Gold (Legacy) - Global
- VMware Principal Partner / Master Services Competency (VMC on AWS, DCV, NV, CMA, Cloud Native*)
- Cisco Advanced Partner (Security, Mobility, Enterprise Networks)
- GCP Service and Resale Partner - Global
- Kubernetes Certified Service Provider
- VMware Consulting Partner - Global
- Hashicorp Partner
- Dell Technologies Consulting Partner - Global
- Arista Partner
- NetApp Partner 
- Palo Alto Partner
- Fortinet Partner
- AquaSec Partner
- Zscaler Partner

For more details please refer to: https://www.intuitive.cloud

Name: Techversant Infotech
Description:
We are an International technology consulting and services company with 13+  years in IT business with 1500+  successful projects delivered across 40+ countries with  400+  technology experts, which include senior developers, team leads, quality & infrastructure engineers, technical architects, business analysts, project & delivery managers. Techversant is one of the world’s ace service providers in ColdFusion, Python, Moodle, Magento,RoR, Java, .Net, Golang. Node, React, Angular, Flutter, ReactNative and AI services .We are specialized in developing cloud and mobile based software solutions that cater the needs of our clients. We have dedicated development centres in Cochin & Trivandrum, India with onshore centre at Alberta, Canada.

Our Vision
To become a Technology service champion by providing great solutions to our customers helping them create a better future.

Our Mission
To help our customers to create a better future by providing innovating, efficient technology solutions and services.

Our Core Values
We inculcate the followings values, which prove to be one of the strongest points that mark us unique in the market.
Helpfulness
Timeliness
Integrity
Purposefulness
Care

Name: Prescient Healthcare Group
Description:
Prescient Healthcare Group - Turning Science into Value for the Biopharma Industry

At Prescient, science is at the core of everything we do. We help our clients develop winning strategies for their molecules every single day. By partnering with us, a molecule in your hands has greater potential for success than the same science in the hands of your competitors. 

Founded in 2007, Prescient is a partner with global reach and specialized capabilities, with six offices across three continents. Our team of nearly 500 experts works with 27 of the top 30 biopharma companies, the fastest-growing mid-caps and cutting-edge emerging biotechs, including some of the biggest and most innovative brands. More than 70% of our employees hold advanced degrees and deliver impressive depth of therapeutic, clinical and commercial expertise, a wealth of relevant experience and knowledge of best practice and common pitfalls. 

Prescient has been a portfolio company of Bridgepoint Development Capital since 2021 and Baird Capital since 2017.

Name: Monjin
Description: Monjin is an online digital video platform where a Monjin empanelled global network of Professional Interviewers/Subject Matter Experts virtually meet candidates/job seekers. The interview is held live through and is recorded, analysed and then presented to clients on the web, mobile and other media devices. These videos are indexed, rated and tagged so employers can choose to view the complete video or ‘jump’ to the relevant parts of the discussion. Suitable candidates are hired based on the assessment of their interviews. Monjin also provides a searchable database of videos available only to clients on a subscription basis or for specific engagements tailored to their needs to access the database of candidate interviews.

Name: Wren Kitchens
Description:
Wren Living has been an industry leader in kitchen manufacturing for both the UK and US markets for 35 years, and has now become the UK's fastest growing designer, manufacturer and retailer of fully assembled kitchen cabinets. We already have 32 showrooms across the UK, and plan to continue our expansion with many more.

Complementing our state-of-the art showrooms is a truly cutting-edge online service, honed over the last five years through the development of Ebuyer.com, which generates in excess of £200 million of sales each year. We support this with a highly advanced logistics and distribution network, ensuring that the quality we demand from our products is continued throughout the delivery process. We truly believe this is what makes Wren Kitchens stand out as the premier choice for all your kitchen needs.

Name: Boots
Description:
Boots is the UK’s largest pharmacy-led health and beauty retailer with a 170-year heritage of caring for communities. With more than 2,200 stores ranging from local community pharmacies to large destination health and beauty stores, our purpose is to keep changing things for the better to support our customers and patients through every stage of their lives. 
 
Boots UK is part of the Retail Pharmacy International division of Walgreens Boots Alliance (WBA), an integrated healthcare, pharmacy and retail leader serving millions of customers and patients every day. WBA has more than 325,000 team members and a presence in nine countries through its portfolio of brands.

More company information is available at boots-uk.com.

Name: PARI
Loction: Gat No. 463/A/2/8 to 463/A/2/11, 463/A/2/15 & 463/A/2/16, Village Dhangarwadi, Tal. Khandala, Dist. Satara, Maharashtra 412801, India
Description:
PARI is amongst the largest global automation companies with over 1100+ employees and 3 facilities worldwide. The solid engineering strength enables PARI to be a complete "Solution Provider"​, from conceptualizing, designing, manufacturing, implementing and supporting advanced factory automation systems. It provides its customers with the solutions they need to enhance productivity and achieve their manufacturing goals.

The company began operations in 1990, and has experienced business growth exceeding 50% year on year, though innovative solutions and focus on complete customer satisfaction. PARI has provided over 3000 automated solutions world wide. PARI was founded by technocrats with the knowledge and experience to understand the needs of the manufacturing industry.
Striving for excellence in every step of the process from sales to commissioning has allowed PARI to attain success. This excellence can be seen in their products, people and solutions.

Name: Blue Shield Of California
Description:
Blue Shield of California’s mission is to ensure all Californians have access to high-quality health care at a sustainably affordable price. We are transforming health care in a way that truly serves our nonprofit mission by lowering costs, improving quality, and enhancing the member and physician experience.

Headquartered in Oakland, CA, we’re proud to service over 4.5 million members and employ more than 7,500 people. We're an independent member of the Blue Shield Association.

In 2015, we acquired Care1st Health Plan, now named Blue Shield of California Promise Health Plan, a provider-founded managed care company based in Los Angeles County, to help us fulfill our mission of providing all Californians with access to high quality, sustainably affordable care.

Name: Radware
Description: Radware (NASDAQ: RDWR), is a global leader of application delivery and application security solutions for virtual and cloud data centers. Its awardwinning solutions portfolio delivers full resilience for business-critical applications, maximum IT efficiency, and complete business agility. Radware’s solutions empower more than 10,000 enterprise and carrier customers worldwide to adapt to market challenges quickly, maintain business continuity and achieve maximum productivity while keeping costs down. For more information, please visit www.radware.com.

Name: Madanapalle Institute of Technology & Science
Loction: Post Box No: 14, Kadiri Road Angallu (V), Madanapalle-517325 Chittoor District, Andhra Pradesh, India
Description:
Madanapalle Institute of Technology & Science is established in 1998 in the picturesque and pleasant environs of Madanapalle and is ideally located on a sprawling 30 acre campus on Madanapalle - Anantapur Highway (NH-205) near Angallu, about 10km away from Madanapalle.

MITS, originated under the auspices of Ratakonda Ranga Reddy Educational Academy under the proactive leadership of Sri. N. Krishna Kumar M.S. (U.S.A), President and Dr. N. Vijaya Bhaskar Choudary, Ph.D., Secretary & Correspondent of the Academy.

MITS is governed by a progressive management that never rests on laurels and has been striving conscientiously to develop it as one of the best centers of Academic Excellence in India. The Institution's profile is firmly based on strategies and action plans that match changing demands of the nation and the students fraternity.MITS enjoys constant support and patronage of NRI's with distinguished academic traditions and vast experience in Engineering & Technology.

Name: Pickrr Technologies
Description: Pickrr is an logistics company that is completely revolutionising the way a business ships a product from one point to another. Now with Pickrr, proprietary AI & Machine learning based technology, a business can deliver any product to any location around the globe with few clicks and get the best service. Our company will take care of all the hassles - right from picking up the product to shipping it to any destination.

Name: Delphix
Description: Delphix is the industry leader in DataOps and accelerates digital transformation for global enterprises. The Delphix DataOps Platform works with a broad spectrum of systems—from mainframes to Oracle databases, ERP applications, and Kubernetes containers. Delphix supports a comprehensive range of data operations that enable modern CI/CD workflows, accelerate cloud migrations, insure compliance, transform customer experiences, and drive adoption of disruptive AI technologies. In a world where every company is becoming a data company, Delphix provides a critical platform to enable data-driven transformation.

Name: PepCoding
Loction: B-4/5, 1st Floor, Sector 63, Noida, Uttar Pradesh

Name: Aera Technology
Description:
In our hyperconnected world, the ability to make every decision, at the right time and at scale, is mission-critical for organizations. Yet, decision making today requires managing countless tools without the cross-business visibility to respond to the unexpected. There’s simply not enough time or people to make timely, accurate decisions.
 
At Aera, we’re focused on changing this. Led by CEO Fred Laluyaux and a team of innovators and technology veterans, Aera Technology (pronounced “era”) was founded in 2017 with a vision of enabling a new era of decision making. 
 
We’ve built the first scalable digital AI platform — our Cognitive Operating System™
 — that integrates with existing systems and enables companies to make and execute intelligent business decisions in real time, automatically.  By combining data, science, process, and engagement in one place, we’re helping organizations across the globe digitize, automate, and augment decision making across every organizational function — procurement, manufacturing, finance, sales and marketing, and beyond. 
 
Privately-held and VC-funded, Aera has offices in eight countries and a global team of 470+ and growing. Working with the largest worldwide brands in consumer packaged goods, healthcare and life sciences, manufacturing, and more, Aera is actively transforming the future of work and business agility through decision intelligence. 
 
Interested in joining our team? Find out more at www.aeratechnology.com

Name: Esko
Description:
Wondering what’s within Danaher? Take a closer look.

At first glance, you’ll see Danaher’s scale. Our 80,000 associates work across the globe at more
than 20 unique operating companies within four platforms—life sciences, diagnostics, water
quality, and product identification. Look again and you’ll see the opportunity to build a
meaningful career, be creative, and take risks with the support you need to be successful. You’ll
find associates who are as certain about their impact as they are about where they’re headed
next. You’ll find the Danaher Business System, which makes everything possible. You’ll also
see a company that investors trust—our culture of continuous improvement has helped us
outperform the S&P 500 by more than 5,000% over the past 25 years.

And no matter where you look at Danaher, at the heart of what we do, you’ll witness our shared
purpose—helping realize life’s potential—in action. Whether we’re enabling our customers to
provide clean water, supporting a life-saving vaccine development, advancing a new instrument
for cancer diagnosis, or ensuring product safety, our work helps improve millions of lives.
We hope you’ll see yourself here, too. What you find at Danaher—and within yourself—
might just change the world.

Name: Saviance Technologies
Description:
Saviance is a US based Healthcare IT Services provider focusing on the newest technology SMAC stack – Social, Mobility, Analytics & Cloud. We provide innovative solutions & enable meaningful use of IT by designing patient engagement portals, collaboration applications & actionable analytics for wellness & population health.

Incorporated in 1999 in New Jersey, with over 14 years of excellent industry track record, Saviance offers services & solutions with the assistance of our highly experienced workforce, defined processes, state-of-art-technologies and client management solutions.  

We are awarded by INC. 5000 as one of the fastest growing privately held companies in North America and are a certified Minority Business Enterprise. Saviance is a Gold Category Corporate Member with Healthcare Information Management Systems Society (HIMSS), a member of mHealth Alliance and a corporate member of NJ-HITEC. We are HIPAA Certified ad AWS Partner.

Name: GoodWorkLabs Services
Description:
GoodWorkLabs is the world leading new-age outsourced product development firm and an UX design studio focused on taking up the most challenging tasks and converting ideas into path-breaking products (be it mobile apps, games or software products). The company was started in 2013 with the objective of becoming a powerhouse of innovation in design and technology for clients globally. 

The firm is currently one of the fastest growing companies in the industry with revenues growing at 500% year-on-year. With offices in Bangalore, Kolkata and San Francisco, it has tens of high profile clients and partners that include Apple, Google, Mercedes-Benz, Flipkart, CommonFloor, Samsung, Unilever, Sesame Street, ST Dupont and Avaya among others.

GoodWorkLabs is also a Google Certified Agency, making it to the elite list of top software and mobile app development companies globally.

Name: IDZ Digital
Description:
IDZ Digital's humble beginnings can be traced back to 2004 when we began creating websites. In 2010, we became one of India's first mobile app developers, having launched our first app.
Today, we are among the leading developers of apps and games for kids, with over 200 million downloads and over 100,000 5-star reviews.
Life at IDZ Digital is stimulating, energetic, and immensely rewarding. Our team of more than 100 enthusiastic minds is always trying out new things and concepts to make our ideas come to life. We have development centers in Borivali and Thane providing a vibrant and joyful working environment.
We're proud to give people a happy, open, and welcoming place to work. We give them responsibilities early on so they can work on their skills, learn faster and move up in their careers.

Name: BIC
Description:
For over 75 years, BIC has been creating ingeniously simple and joyful products that are a part of every heart and home.

As a member of our team, you'll be a part of reigniting a beloved brand as we continue to reimagine everyday essentials in new, sustainable and responsible ways.

Our "roll up your sleeves and get the job done" approach to work creates an environment where self-starters, problem solvers and innovative thinkers thrive. BIC team members are empowered to take ownership of their careers and bring their unique perspectives to the table to make a meaningful impact on our mission.

It's a colorful world - make your mark by joining the BIC team today.

Name: Kiewit Corporation
Description:
We exist to make a difference and we offer opportunities for you to make one too. Our construction and engineering professionals work on some of the industry’s most complex, challenging and rewarding projects – whether it’s boring tunnels through mountains, turning rivers into energy, or building bridges that connect communities. Kiewit people tackle important projects of every size, in any market. Start your Kiewit adventure today at kiewitjobs.com.

Kiewit is one of North America’s largest and most respected construction and engineering organizations. With its roots dating back to 1884, the employee-owned organization operates through a network of subsidiaries in the United States, Canada, and Mexico. Kiewit offers construction and engineering services in a variety of markets including transportation; oil, gas and chemical; power; building; water/wastewater; industrial; and mining. Kiewit had 2021 revenues of $12.1 billion and employs 28,800 staff and craft employees.

Name: SWORD GROUP
Description:
Sword has 2,600+ IT/Digital & Software specialists present over 5 continents to accompany you in the growth of your organisation in the digital age.
As a leader in technological and digital transformation, Sword has a solid reputation in software publishing and in complex IT & business project management.
Sword optimises your processes and enhances your data.

Name: Post Office
Description: The Post Office is unique. With a 370 year history, it is part of the social fabric of the country, as well as being the country’s largest retail network with 11,500 branches across the UK. For many rural communities the Post Office is the only retail outlet. Post Offices are therefore vitally important for the future of these communities.

Name: LEONI
Description:
LEONI is a global provider of products, solutions and services for energy and data management in the automotive industry. The market-listed group of companies has around 100,000 employees in 28 countries and generated consolidated sales of EUR 5.1 billion in 2021. 

The value chain ranges from standardized cables and special cables to highly complex wiring systems and related components. Leoni supports its customers as an innovation partner and solution provider with distinctive development and system expertise on the way to increasingly sustainable and connected mobility concepts by developing the next generation of wiring systems.

Name: CACIB
Description: Crédit Agricole CIB, the Corporate & Investment Banking arm of the Crédit Agricole group, specialises in the businesses of capital markets and investment and corporate banking.

Name: Dentsu World Services
Description:
Dentsu World Services is a proud part of dentsu International– a 48,000-strong team of dedicated specialists spread across 9 network brands and 145 countries. We are a global hub delivering best-in-class creative,  technology, and commerce solutions for dentsu International.
Our advanced technology stacks and core capabilities of services and solutions across the breadth and depth of the technology domain — Unified Commerce Solutions, Digital Transformation, Experience Technology, Data Analytics, Creative Technologies, and Quality Engineering enable our clients to transform and scale exponentially. Over the years, we have created innovating multi-channel platforms and solutions for major international brands and retailers, including Sony, Adidas, Speedo, Shiseido, Canon, Zwilling, Signify and more.  
(Formerly Isobar World Services and Winner of Great Indian Workplace Award 2019).

Name: Joveo
Description:
Joveo was founded in 2017 by a group of visionary entrepreneurs and passionate problem solvers who foresaw the need for greater transparency and predictability in recruitment marketing.

As the global leader in programmatic job advertising, we are changing the way recruitment media buying is done. 

The Joveo platform enables businesses to buy, manage, and track recruitment media, including job sites, social and search marketplaces, and the whole World Wide Web, to attract and hire the most relevant applicants on time, within their budget. Powering more than 20 million jobs every day, our data-driven recruitment advertising platform uses advanced data science and machine learning to dynamically manage and optimize talent sourcing and applications across all online channels while providing real-time insights at every step of the job seeker journey from click to hire. 

For more information, visit www.joveo.com.

Name: Gilead Sciences
Description: Gilead Sciences, Inc. is a biopharmaceutical company that has pursued and achieved breakthroughs in medicine for more than three decades, with the goal of creating a healthier world for all people. The company is committed to advancing innovative medicines to prevent and treat life-threatening diseases, including HIV, viral hepatitis and cancer. Gilead operates in more than 35 countries worldwide, with headquarters in Foster City, California.

Name: Toshiba Global Commerce Solutions
Description: Toshiba Global Commerce Solutions is a global market share leader in retail store technology and retail’s first choice for unified commerce solutions. Together with a global team of dedicated business partners, we advance the future of retail with innovative commerce solutions that enhance customer engagement, transform the in-store experience, and accelerate digital transformation.

Name: Zacks Investment Research
Loction: 10 S Riverside Plz # 1600 Chicago, Illinois, 60606-3830, United States

Name: METRO SERVICES
Loction: Cluster D, Wing 2, 3rd & 6th floor, EON IT Park, Kharadi
Description:
METRO SERVICES is a part of METRO Group AG, founded in 2011 it comprises of three Shared Service Centers in Pune (India), Szczecin (Poland) and Düsseldorf (Germany). 

With over 751 stores in 25 countries, employing more than 110,000 and serving 21 million customers daily we are one of the largest wholesale and food retail business in the world.

Name: XO Communications
Description: XO Communications a Verizon Company provides the technology that helps business and wholesale customers compete in a hyper-connected economy.

Name: Samsung Semiconductor Inc (US)
Description:
OVERVIEW

Samsung Semiconductor Inc. (SSI) is advancing the world’s technology. As a leader in Memory, System, LSI, and LCD technologies, our US teams contribute to breakthroughs in 5G, SOC, memory, and display. With our global perspective and diversity of thought, we proudly serve our customers around the world. We are looking for team members who share our commitment to learning and growth and excel when collaborating within and across teams.

SSI is headquartered in the heart of Silicon Valley and is a wholly-owned U.S. subsidiary of Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd. - the #1 employer in the world (Forbes, Oct 2021 & 2020) and #2 patent-holder in the U.S. 

Together with our parent company, Samsung Electronics, we are transforming the worlds of TVs, smartphones, tablets, PCs, cameras, home appliances, printers, LTE systems, medical devices, semiconductors, and LED solutions.

Name: Noodles & Company
Description:
We’re real people who treat each other like real family and are always open to making new friends. Together we create craveable flavors from around the globe, where every recipe is made to order and every ingredient is something to feel good about. 

But we’re still individuals with unique goals and different passions. After all, one person’s Wisconsin Mac & Cheese is another person’s Penne Rosa, and that’s the way it should be. So whether you’re working in a restaurant, out in the field or at our corporate offices in Colorado, we’ll help you pursue your passions and get involved with the community you serve. We’re a company that cares and it shows.

Name: NSC Global
Description:
There are lots of IT Services businesses but very few like NSC Global.  The clue is in the word Global - as we maintain, supply and support some of the world's largest companies and institutions' networks, end-points and datacentres everywhere!  No matter what country, what IT brand or service requirement - NSC is there with a single point of contact and a common service level.  This allows us to provide IT without borders and gives our customers a unique approach.  

Our vision is to be recognised as the pre-eminent Global supplier of commodity IT services.  

Hence we work with some of the largest IT manufacturers in all corners of the world as well as some of the world's largest System Integrators and Telecoms providers delivering services they can't; don't want but most importantly need.  The business has over £160m global revenues and this is set to grow as the services we deliver have never been more in demand.  

Its fast, furious, competitive and demanding work whether you are in sales or delivery - but hugely rewarding.  With offices and contracts in almost every country in the world - there is always an opportunity at NSC Global.

We are a private company with huge growth ambitions.  Come and add your knowledge and enthusiasm to one of the world's key suppliers of IT and help us deliver our vision.

Name: Indiana University Health
Description:
Indiana University Health is Indiana’s largest and most comprehensive healthcare system, with hospitals and specialties ranked among the nation’s best by U.S. News & World Report.

A unique partnership with the Indiana University School of Medicine—one of the nation’s largest medical schools—gives patients access to groundbreaking research and innovative treatments, and it offers team members access to the latest science and the very best training—advancing healthcare for all.

At IU Health, your personal and professional growth is a top priority. You will have access to many diverse opportunities to learn and develop in meaningful ways that matter most to you, such as advanced clinical training, leadership development, promotion opportunities and cross-training development.

Name: Knack Systems
Description:
Knack Systems is a global customer experience services company, delivering consulting and technology services and solutions to customer-focused organizations across industries since 1998.
