O-I operates 72 plants in 20 countries, with over 25,000 talented people around the world. And, together we Make What Matters.

Name: CommLab India
Description:
As former Training & L&D professionals, we get how frustrating it can be to deal with multiple, small, incompetent eLearning vendors who cannot meet your varied training needs and aggressive timelines at efficient pricing. 

That’s why we offer all services at one place and have specialized in designing effective corporate eLearning training solutions that for the last 20 years have delighted more than 100 global organizations in 30+ countries. 

So, you can stop getting frustrated with needing to work with multiple vendors for different types of work, their inability to roll out large number of courses, unexpected cost escalations and delays in training rollout, and instead become the most sought-after Training Manager offering the right type of training at the right time, well within your training budget! 

Rapid eLearning Solutions for Speed, Scale and Value 

Started in 2000 by former Training & L&D professionals, CommLab India has developed more than 100,000 learning hours of eLearning over the last 20 years. We have been ranked among the top 10 e-learning development companies in the world for three successive years by eLearning Industry. 

Classroom to eLearning Conversion: We convert your classroom Instructor-led Training (ILT) material – PowerPoint decks, Facilitator guides and Participant handouts – into instructionally sound, engaging, and effective eLearning in all its avatars – microlearning, mobile learning, blended learning, just-in-time job-aids, and performance support learning assets. 

Legacy Course Conversions: We convert your legacy courses developed in Flash and other obsolete software into HTML5 for mobile compatibility (with or without source files) with our 4 ‘R’ strategies – Record, Republish, Rebuild, and Redesign. 

eLearning Translations:  We offer translation of your English eLearning courses into more than 35 international languages. We not only translate, we also localize – taking care of cultural differences, colors, images, instructions, and navigation. 

Areas of Expertise 

Rapid Design & Development: With our 20 years of experience in corporate training and proficiency in rapid eLearning, we create fully functional, engaging online modules from your classroom material, retaining the essence of the classroom in the eLearning. 

Any eLearning Authoring Tool: We bring your online training to life with our extensive experience in all the latest authoring tools (Articulate Storyline, Lectora Online, Adobe Captivate, iSpring) and software tools (Vyond). 

Agile Project Management: With our agile project management process, we keep in regular communication, minimize SMEs time for reviews, quickly scale up development, and deliver eLearning courses within timelines.

Name: ControlCase
Description: ControlCase is a global provider of Compliance as a Service (CaaS), enterprise software and services company. Our offerings enable our clients to effectively manage their IT Governance, Risk Management and Compliance Management (IT GRCM or GRC) efforts. We are headquartered in the United States, with locations in North America, Europe, Asia/Pacific and the Middle East. We provide companies of all sizes and government agencies across the globe with compliance and risk management solutions.

Name: Receptionist and Staff Resources
Loction: Headquarters in Manhattan Park, United States

Name: Prompt Softech
Description:
We are a passion-driven Embedded Service provider and Software Development Company. We face every challenge with joy and commitment. We continuously seek balance between ideas, design and technology. We deliver intelligent products, engaging experience and exceptional solutions for our incredible clients all over the world. Proven global capabilities, quality standards, and efficient delivery processes, makes us your global partner for a new era.

We render solutions that are simple, logical and clear to our clients. We provide solutions to perfection that makes sense by accumulating in beautiful design, experimentation, interaction and attention to detail.

We provide advanced solutions to a wide range of small, large and medium-sized enterprises. We have been recognized by both partners and industry analysts for our extensive services and capabilities that help clients win in today’s versatile global marketplace.

Name: Aspire
Description:
Aspire is the leading all-in-one finance operating system for growing businesses in South-East Asia. We are on a mission to reinvent business finance for a new generation of entrepreneurs and business owners, empowering startups to realise their full potential.

Founded in 2018 by former Lazada founders and executives, Aspire has raised over USD 200M+ across equity and debt from world-class investors. To power our solutions we have partnered with some of the best companies in the world such as Visa and Wise. 

In 2020 we were awarded Hottest Startup by Singapore Business Review and Finalist MAS Fintech Awards, and in 2021 were named in LinkedIn’s Top 5 Startups to work for in Singapore. We currently have over 170 employees across offices in Singapore, Indonesia, Vietnam and a flexible working culture.

You will be amazed by the energy and experience of our team. We are a team of ex-entrepreneurs, ex-founders, and high-achievers with international backgrounds. We team up to reach the highest standards in what we do, and don’t take NO for an answer.

We are expanding rapidly. Are you a top talent? Are you passionate about entrepreneurship? Join us and make an impact in the fintech space.

Name: Vmoksha Technologies
Description: Vmoksha Technologies Private Limited is an IT services company headquartered in Bangalore, India and having global presence in USA, Europe and Asia Pacific with offices in Bangalore, Newport Beach , London and Singapore. Vmoksha provides wide range of service offerings since the year 2001 to their customers worldwide in the areas of Application Engineering, Mobility, Cloud Computing, Internet of Things, Testing Services, Infrastructure Management, Staff Augmentation, Telephony & IVR Solutions and User Experience & User Interface Design. Vmoksha has clear focus on high-value, low-cost solution for customers and partners. Some of their major clients are 3M Healthcare, UCB, Edwards, Christie’s, NTUC Fairprice, S1 Corporation (now part of ACI worldwide), Pickfords, Toyota, Gallo Wineries, CPA Global, IBM, Hewlett Packard, Capgemini, Tech Mahindra, ITC Infotech, Cisco, Wincor Nixdorf, Nextance, Unilever-India etc.

Name: UNHCR
Description:
The Office of the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees was established on December 14, 1950 by the United Nations General Assembly. The agency is mandated to lead and co-ordinate international action to protect refugees and resolve refugee problems worldwide. 

Its primary purpose is to safeguard the rights and well-being of refugees. It strives to ensure that everyone can exercise the right to seek asylum and find safe refuge in another State, with the option to return home voluntarily, integrate locally or to resettle in a third country. It also has a mandate to help stateless people.

Name: ARaymond
Description:
Founded in Grenoble in 1865, and still headquartered in the city to this day, we’re a family-run business with a proud history of innovation — including the invention of the press stud. Human values have driven our success for over 157 years, embodied by our servant-leadership model of management that empowers employees and puts their wellbeing first.

Today we employ more than 8,000 people in 25 countries worldwide. And we’re committed to leading in sustainability for the global fastening and assembly market.

At ARaymond we draw from long-term expertise to tackle assembly challenges and create sustainable solutions for fastening, fluid connection, and integration. Our mission is to increase assembly efficiency and quality for our customers worldwide. We partner with our customers from the very first stages of the design process to come up with value-creating assembly solutions for battery pack architecture, high-voltage management, and thermal management. Our expertise encompasses design, development, prototyping, and manufacturing, positioning us to support you throughout your project.

ARaymond is best known as a supplier to the automotive industry. However, we also innovate for a wide range of other industries, drawing on our knowledge and experience to deliver best-in-class fastening and assembly solutions for diverse manufactured goods.

Name: Northwestern University
Description: What's NU? With its main campus in the Chicago suburb of Evanston, Northwestern University (NU) serves its 16,500 students through around a dozen schools and colleges such as the McCormick School of Engineering and Applied Sciences and the Medill School of Journalism. Its Chicago campus houses the schools of law and medicine, as well as several hospitals of the McGaw Medical Center. With a faculty of 2,500, the school has a student-teacher ratio of 7:1. NU is home to several research centers and community outreach programs; it also has a branch in Qatar. It is the only private member of the Big 10 conference; varsity sports include baseball, football, basketball, and fencing.

Name: Armstrong World Industries
Description:
Armstrong World Industries, Inc. (AWI) is a trusted leader in the design and manufacture of innovative commercial and residential ceiling, wall and suspension system solutions. 

At home, at work, in healthcare facilities, classrooms, stores, or restaurants, AWI offers interior solutions that help to enhance comfort, save time, improve building efficiency and overall performance, and create beautiful spaces. We are all about inspiring great spaces. This is our passion. We can make a real difference in the well-being of people...with our ceilings' acoustical and safety performance, with our commitment to the most stringent sustainability and quality requirements, and with our pursuit of innovative ways to make ceilings contribute to better living. 

For more than 150 years, we have built our business on trust and integrity. Along with our ability to collaborate with and innovate for the people we’re here to serve – our customers, our shareholders, our communities and our employees.

Name: Avianca
Description: Passenger airline Aerovías Nacionales del Continente Americano, known as Avianca, has moved beyond its base in Colombia to cover more of its home region and the world. The airline flies to about 40 destinations, half in Colombia and half in other countries (mainly in the Americas but also in Europe.) It operates a fleet of about 55 Boeing and Airbus aircraft. Avianca also operates air cargo service Tampa Cargo. Founded in 1919, Avianca is one of the oldest airlines in the world. Brazil-based conglomerate Synergy Group, led by oil magnate German Efromovich, owns a controlling stake in Avianca. In February 2010 Avianca and El Salvador-based carrier TACA formed a new joint holding company, which Avianca controls.

Name: University of Arizona
Description: The University of Arizona is a premier, public research university. Established in 1885 as the first university in the state and the state’s land-grant university, the UA is building a better Arizona through access, quality and discovery.

Name: Acuiti Labs
Description: Acuiti Labs is an SAP Certified Silver Partner and a UK based digital transformation firm offering services like SAP BRIM, Subscription Billing, CPQ, and more to let your business offer the best customer experience.

Name: Hospital Sisters Health System
Description: Since 1875, the Hospital Sisters of St. Francis have been caring for patients in Illinois, Wisconsin and other locations in the United States and across the world. Today, Hospital Sisters Health System (HSHS) is a multi-institutional health care system that cares for patients in 14 communities in Illinois and Wisconsin.

Name: TRG
Description: For The Richards Group every day is brand new. The independent advertising agency specializes in creating loyalty for its customers' brands through marketing, public relations, and sales promotions. Services include creating company or product names and inventing corporate identities, as well as graphic design, packaging, analytics, digital marketing, and marketing for certain niches, including sports, entertainment, and minorities. Founded by Stan Richards in 1965, the group builds brand awareness through everything from print ads to employee uniform design. It has molded the public's perception of such brands as Amstel Light, Fruit of the Loom, GameStop, Motel 6, The Home Depot, and Red Lobster.

Name: Amiga Informatics
Description: Amiga Informatics has been a major force in the IT staff augmentation market, working with the best and brightest talent, and providing market-leading IT recruitment solutions for companies internationally. We have over 15 years experienced management team emerging the talents in business IT solutions(BITS) in various domains. We provide the best IT services in the industries across the globe.

Name: Cogno AI
Loction: E-165, Solaris 1, Saki Vihar Road, Powai
Description: Cogno AI by AllinCall is an AI-driven Omnichannel Cloud Communication-as-a-Service that uses a combination of ChatBots, Live Agent Chat, Cobrowsing, and Video Calling to provide a Delightful Customer Experience across all Digital Channels.

Name: Sri Mookambika Infosolutions
Description:
SMI desires to be an Employer of Choice for Talented, Hardworking & Committed people. Our Employees are Highly Competent, Disciplined & Forward Thinking People in Today’s World.

For us, it is important that we maintain the same accord when we accrue paving no way for dilution. We believe that by recruiting the Best Talents, giving the best Compensation, retaining with good HR practices; we’ll be able to work on an agile based environment. Everybody benefits!

Working with SMI is not a job. It is a Journey! There’s so much to explore here – even about YOU! – that every day is a New Day.

We invite you to be a vibrant part of Professional Culture, Dedicated to Fun, Passion, High Ethical Standards and Service Delivery Excellence.

Name: Qapitol QA
Description:
Qapitol QA is one of the fastest growing companies in the quality engineering and test automation space with a global presence that spans across India, United Kingdom, United States, and Europe. We are enabling some of the most loved global brands across industry verticals to scale greater heights with our expert software quality engineering services portfolio.

We are an innovation driven team that's constantly pushing boundaries and exploring new areas, in pursuit of building a new vision for quality engineering. We empower our people to operate at the intersection of domain, emerging tech and test engineering where we forge products and services of the future. 

If autonomy and the best of tech excites you, we may just be the place for you to build an exciting career path.

Name: SMARTe
Description:
SMARTe serves 300+ customers in 150+ industries across 202 countries. As a true agile Data-as-a-Service partner, we at SMARTe provide ‘high-quality global contact data’ fueled by data science and supported by 200+ data experts who build taxonomies and algorithms. Unlike our competitors, SMARTe's data capabilities span the traditional and new-age functions across 44 countries. 

Our Products at a glance:

SMARTe Discover
Empower your sales and marketing teams with a 360° prospector that offers accurate mobile numbers across 44 countries.

SMARTe Enrich
Real-time enrichment and data health analysis across all CRMs and MAPs through integrations and APIs.

SMARTe Bespoke
Leverage the power of 100% accurate, phone-verified, and SLA guaranteed prospect data across 202 countries.

SMARTe Consent
Boost demand generation with opted-in and consented leads.


Key features: 
•	Data coverage spanning millions of contacts and decision-makers worldwide
•	Direct access to key decision-makers with accurate direct dials
•	Multiple delivery options - CRM, stand-alone, API, and Chrome Plug-in
•	Integrations with leading CRM systems and other marketing platforms
•	100% accurate, GDPR compliant, double opt-in data
•	List building capabilities to create customized company and contact lists
•	Technographic discovery of actionable contacts and accounts 
•	Real-time data enrichment and visualization

Learn more at www.smarteinc.com. Send in your inquiries to contactus@smarteinc.com.

Name: Varuna Integrated Logistics
Description:
Our story began in 1996, at the threshold of a new era in Indian logistics. Since then, Varuna Group has operated with the principles of customer-centricity, operational excellence and transparency, partnering with supply chain leaders to manage their end-to-end logistics operations with the aim of reducing the effective landed cost of products. Every day, our 1500+ trained specialists in 60+ branches and 24 warehouses work with utmost dedication and an unparalleled zeal to deliver excellent service and exceptional savings, leading to true value creation for our clients.

At the heart of it, is our unwavering commitment to integrity, dependability, excellence, and high ethical standards. These beliefs have inspired the values that guide us and empower us on our way forward.

OUR SERVICE OFFERINGS
Transportation
Warehousing
Integrated Services

INDUSTRIES CATERING TO
FMCG, F&B, Tyre, Automotive, Pharmaceuticals, Electrical, Chemical, Construction, etc

OUR USPs:
Company Owned Fleet of 1800+ trucks
100% deliveries within SLA 
Transparency - Customer is completely aware of vehicle status at all times
Technology Driven - Real time control tower with every vehicle mapped
95% Placements Performance

Name: Hager Group
Description:
Hager Group is a leading supplier of solutions and services for electrical installations in residential, commercial and industrial buildings.
For the development and production of these solutions, Hager Group relies on a portfolio of proven specialists. The Hager brand, with products ranging from energy distribution through cable management and wiring accessories to building automation and security systems, represents the core business of the company. Other brands of Hager Group are Berker, Daitem and Diagral, as well as Efen, Elcom and Bocchiotti. This allows the group to combine all the skills necessary for the development of innovative products, systems and services required for building automation.
Hager Group is, though, a worldwide business venture: 11,500 employees generate a turnover of around 2 billion euros (2018). Components and solutions are produced in 22 production sites around the globe and customers in more than 120 countries all over the world trust in them.

Name: Terumo Blood and Cell Technologies
Description:
Terumo BCT, a global leader in blood component, therapeutic apheresis and cellular technologies, is the only company with the unique combination of apheresis collections, manual and automated whole blood processing, and pathogen reduction. We believe in the potential of blood to do even more for patients than it does today. This belief inspires our innovation and strengthens our collaboration with customers.

We develop blood collection and processing systems to hospitals and blood banks. Its systems are used to separate blood into its different components, such as platelets, plasma, and leukoreduced red blood cells (or blood with the white cells removed). The company also provides apheresis systems used to develop blood-based therapies for the treatment of cancer and other diseases. It has operations in 30 countries and sells its products to more than 90 nations around the world. Gambro AB sold CaridianBCT to Terumo in 2011.

Name: Plan International
Description:
Founded over 75 years ago, Plan is one of the oldest and largest children's development organisations in the world.

We work in 50 developing countries across Africa, Asia and the Americas to promote child rights and lift millions of children out of poverty.

In 2013, Plan worked with 78 million children in 90,229 communities.

Plan is independent, with no religious, political or governmental affiliations. 

Our vision
Plan's vision is of a world in which all children realise their full potential in societies that respect people's rights and dignity.

Name: UWorld
Description: At UWorld, we build exceptional testing and education products that improve human learning while helping students and professionals reach their full potential. Preparing for a licensing or college entrance exam is one of the most significant and stressful times in a student's life. Getting their target score presents opportunities that wouldn’t be open to them otherwise. We help them achieve this score by providing resources that teach students to learn and master concepts covered on the exam, helping them know what to expect--and succeed--on test day.

Name: Everi
Description:
Everi was born when two companies that have served the casino industry for decades — Global Cash Access and Multimedia Games — became one with the mission of becoming a transformative force on the casino floor. Upon its launch in 2015, Everi is committed to expanding its innovative and creative reach, building a culture based on the tenets of respect and transparency, and continuously striving to see how the company can help patrons and operators alike have transcendent experiences on the casino floor.  Together, we are Everi.

Come work with the BEST in the industry!  Everi Studios can be found in the Windy City (Chicago), The Biggest Little City in the World (Reno) and The Live Music Capital in the World (Austin).

Name: San Diego State University
Description: San Diego State University (SDSU), with an enrollment of more than 35,000, is one of the largest universities in California. It offers some 75 academic programs leading to about 85 bachelor's, 75 master's, and 15 joint-doctoral degrees. Its Imperial Valley campus on the Mexican border provides upper-division courses and exchange programs with Mexican universities in Baja California. More than one-fifth of SDSU's student population is Hispanic. The school was founded in 1897 as a training center for elementary school teachers. It is part of the California State University System.

Name: SMEClabs
Description:
We are proud to host an array of engineers and industry experts who put in their ideas and instincts to develop new technology, which is crucial for any player to stay on top of the game. We are focused on developing and constantly re-innovating indigenous technology which is more adaptable to the Indian customer needs and which is also more economically viable.

SMEC also runs a training division specializing in the effective training of engineering and diploma students. Training is designed to cover all aspects of most of our installations over the years to provide for the smooth transfer of REAL knowledge and expertise that we have gained over the years.

Training is HANDS-ON and covers all required fundamental and specialist know-how in system operation, troubleshooting & maintenance.

Name: Anthropologie
Description:
Anthropologie is a lifestyle brand that imparts a sense of beauty, optimism and discovery to our customer. For her, Anthropologie is an escape from the everyday; it is a source of inspiration and delight, where innovative merchandising, customer centricity and a curated array of products come together to create an unimagined experience.

Anthropologie products are an expression of our customer's appreciation for artfulness and good design. To that end, our buyers and designers travel the world to uncover special products and to collaborate with talented artisans. Our assortment includes clothing, accessories, shoes, beauty, home furnishings, found objects, gifts and décor that exhibit influences ranging from vintage to global.

Founded in 1992, Anthropologie currently operates stores worldwide. The brand launched its mail-order catalog and website in 1998; eleven years later, its first international stores opened in Canada and UK.

Name: ABCO Advisory Services India
Description:
ABCO India Private Limited (formerly ABCO Advisory Services India Pvt Ltd) is now OptumInsight India Private Limited. 

OptumInsight India Private Limited (formerly known as ABCO India Private Limited, an Optum company) is a leading health services and innovation company dedicated to help make the health system work better for everyone. With more than 115,000 people worldwide, Optum combines technology, data and expertise to improve the delivery, quality and efficiency of health care. We are the fastest growing part of the global UnitedHealth Group family of businesses – a Global fortune 15 company and Fortune 6 company (U.S)

Name: Rice University
Description: Located on a 300-acre tree-lined campus in Houston, Rice University is consistently ranked among the nation’s top 20 universities by U.S. News & World Report. Rice’s undergraduate student-to-faculty ratio is approximately 6-to-1. Its residential college system builds close-knit communities and lifelong friendships, just one reason why Rice is highly ranked for best quality of life by the Princeton Review and for best value among private universities by Kiplinger’s Personal Finance.

Name: Yale University
Description:
Working at Yale (your.yale.edu/careers) means contributing to a better tomorrow. 

Since its founding in 1701, Yale has been dedicated to expanding and sharing knowledge, inspiring innovation, and preserving cultural and scientific information for future generations.

Yale’s reach is both local and international. It partners with its hometown of New Haven, Connecticut to strengthen the city’s community and economy. And it engages with people and institutions across the globe in the quest to promote cultural understanding, improve the human condition, delve more deeply into the secrets of the universe, and train the next generation of world leaders.

Name: Sentieo
Description: Sentieo is a financial data platform underpinned by the latest search technology. We overlay search, collaboration and automation on key aspects of an analyst's workflow so that you can spend less time searching and more time analyzing. It offers contextualized search of earnings conference calls, a natural language processing tool that's increasingly used by investors to recall specific facts, or to pick up on company and sector-wide themes. Presently, Sentieo processes over 20 million financial documents from over 64,000 companies around the world. The nascent fintech furthermore has built a litany of alternative data sets that yield new insights on  companies by tracking their web and social media traffic.

Name: American Campus Communities
Description:
American Campus Communities was formed in 1993 with four employees, one student housing management contract and a vision to be the best student housing company in the nation. Today, ACC is the nation’s largest developer, owner and manager of high-quality student housing communities. 

ACC is passionate about student success. Whether the company is creating a new development, upgrading an acquired property, or partnering with a university to develop or manage on-campus housing, the goal is the same: deliver the best possible experience for students—at every price point. 

ACC is just as passionate about creating rewarding careers for its team members. At ACC you’ll find a hardworking, motivating culture with unlimited potential for contribution and growth. ACC’s commitment to job training and its promote-from-within approach means your opportunities can be as vast as your ambition.

Name: Vinci
Description: Veni, vidi, vici ...VINCI. Through its VINCI Construction division, this company conquers the world as one of the largest building, civil engineering, and maintenance contractors. VINCI operates in two divisions: concessions and contracting (85% of sales). Its concessions business, which builds and operates motorways, parking garages, rail infrastructure, stadiums, and airports includes motorway operator VINCI Autoroutes and parking manager VINCI Park. Under the contracting umbrella VINCI provides electrical engineering, maintenance, and facilities management. Roadworks and transportation infrastructure is handled by Eurovia. VINCI is active in some 100 countries, with France accounting for about 60% of sales.

Name: KRYPT
Description: Krypt is the #1 value-add service provider for SAP Global Trade and Supply Chain solutions. We believe that we are only as successful as our customers. Because of this philosophy, we partner with our customers and become their trusted ally in everything from strategy and planning, to execution to maintenance and support.

Name: Rittal
Description:
In 2011, Rittal was able to reflect on five very successful decades. For the past 50 years, we have been redefining the future. We manufacture and develop solutions on your behalf in the enclosure, power distribution, IT infrastructure, software and service sectors – standardised, perfect-fit solutions for almost any industry.

With its system platform "Rittal – The System.", this family business offers top-level, innovative technology on a global basis, however large or small your company may be. Embark on a voyage of discovery.

The future – your success – starts right here.

Name: SysMind
Description: SysMind is an Inc. 500, certified Woman-Owned Business that provides premier IT staffing and solutions. In our 18+years of experience, we have partnered with hundreds of clients across a range of industries nationwide, with client and consultant relationships that have lasted as long as we have been in business. Built upon a revolutionary transparent-margin business model, our mission is to provide better value for the organizations we partner with. We are committed to understanding client goals, aiming to maximize efficiency while focusing on helping the organization achieve its mission while exceeding expectations.

Name: BlaBlaCar
Description:
BlaBlaCar is the global leader in long-distance ridesharing. We are a high-growth international company with a true start-up spirit. With an entrepreneurial state of mind, we innovate, grow and synchronize our efforts to make BlaBlaCar a great place to work whilst continuing to build a global people-powered transport network. We are always recruiting talented new team members to be part of our exciting story.

With dedicated customer service, state-of-the-art web and mobile platforms, and a highly engaged community of members, BlaBlaCar is making road travel fun, money-saving and more efficient.

https://youtu.be/gcO3Ijt0T6k and https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=56G-ktC7hyg&feature=youtu.be

Name: V.Group
Description:
Formed in 1984, V.Ships is the leading supplier of independent ship management and related marine services to the global shipping industry. Currently, it supplies services to a fleet of over 1,000 vessels and manages a crew roster of 24,000 staff.

V.Ships’ core ship management and manpower services are managed by three operating divisions – V.Ships Ship Management, V.Ships Leisure and Manpower Services – supported by a corporate executive team. These three divisions work in close association with two further divisions – V.Ships Marine Services and V.Ships Capital – which provide a broad range of related commercial, technical, operational and financial services.

Name: Powerupcloud Technologies
Description:
Powerupcloud is an enterprise class yet disruptive cloud consulting company. We disrupt the traditional IT services industry by focusing on agile practices, bleeding edge technology tools, outcome based SLAs and more importantly, fair pricing. We have optimized our operations by carefully choosing certain key aspects like location, ops team profile, tools used, shift models and more without compromising on quality to deliver cloud consulting and managed services to our customers.

Our consulting team can help you implement, migrate and optimize your applications in cloud. We also help you build Big Data analytics platform to enable you extract more value from your data. 

Powerupcloud team has expertise in leading cloud & virtualization platforms – AWS, Azure, Google Cloud, VMware, Rackspace and Digital Ocean. 

Powerupcloud also has a thriving product division which is building enterprise AI engine Botzer (http://botzer.io) and smart analytics platform - Recomind.

Name: Centizen
Description: Centizen is an IT solutions and service company. Over the past fifteen years, Centizen has grown into a fully cross-functional, driven software development team focused on delivering custom applications of exceptional quality across any enterprise. We love to combine our proficiency in creating software with the vision of innovative business leaders, working together to craft something new and of lasting value. Over the years, we have had great success demonstrating that software built from scratch, quickly and iteratively, with only the features needed, can enable companies in surprising ways.

Name: Modine Manufacturing
Description: Modine Manufacturing runs hot and cold but not when it comes to business. Founded in 1916, the company designs and makes highly engineered heating and cooling systems and components for a range of customers worldwide: automotive OEMs, agricultural and construction OEMs, heating and cooling equipment OEMs, construction contractors, wholesalers of plumbing and heating equipment, and fuel cell manufacturers. Products include heat transfer modules, oil coolers, radiators, and vehicular air conditioning systems. BMW, Caterpillar, and Daimler are among its key customers. With operations in some 14 countries and technical centers in the US and Germany, more than half of Modine's revenues are generated outside of the US.

Name: PhillipCapital
Description: PhillipCapital UK is a Subsidiary of PhillipCapital Group of Companies (Singapore HQ). We have 17 offices around the globe and has been around since 1975.

Name: Hallmark Global Technologies
Description:
Hallmark Global Technologies Ltd is established in the year 2002, Hallmark Global Technologies has an exceptional track record of transcending the core operations of its clients and helping them meet their ever-evolving market needs.

We offer comprehensive and personalized solutions to our clients, who are IT companies, Retailers, Healthcare Technology providers, Industries ranging from Automobiles, Insurance Services, Retail Services, the Transportation industry, Banking and Finance, and Healthcare.

Hallmark Global Technologies has also made considerable strides in providing consultancy and advocacy services to its clients by fulfilling their staffing and Human Resource Management requirements. The core strength of Hallmark Global technology lies in its ability to adapt to fast-emerging markets and consumer behavior that pose both challenges and opportunities.

Name: Fives
Description:
As a historical industrial engineering group, we have been designing the disruptive solutions and technologies that define industry for over 200 years. As a pioneer in decarbonization and digitalization, Fives is always one innovation ahead and anticipates its customers' needs. We meet this challenge every day thanks to our 8,500 employees who work in 25 countries and over 500 different kinds of jobs.

The Group’s strategy is also backed by a human resources policy that is focused on the individual, encourages initiative-taking, technical excellence and team spirit, within human-sized organizations.

Name: AlgoSec
Description:
AlgoSec, a global cybersecurity leader, empowers organizations to securely accelerate application delivery by automating application connectivity and security policy, anywhere. 

The AlgoSec platform enables the world’s most complex organizations to gain visibility, reduce risk and process changes at zero-touch across the hybrid network.  

AlgoSec’s patented application-centric view of the hybrid network enables business owners, application owners, and information security professionals to talk the same language, so organizations can deliver business applications faster while achieving a heightened security posture. 

Over 1,800 of the world’s leading organizations trust AlgoSec to help secure their most critical workloads across public cloud, private cloud, containers, and on-premises networks, while taking advantage of almost two decades of leadership in Network Security Policy Management.

Name: 2Base Technologies
Description:
2Base Technologies is an enterprise software development company providing end-to-end IT digital transformation services. 

2Base is passionate about simplifying the Digital Transformation Journey of our partners. We have crafted sophisticated solutions for our clients in Edu-Tech, Insurance, Travel & Logistic, Hospitality, Healthcare, F&B and Fin-Tech. We have R&D centres in Kochi & Palakkad, India and are a trusted technology partner to more than 200 customers. 

Over the past 12 years, 2Base has focused on co-creating the best solutions with the partners to design their digital transformation program for improved growth and the future. 

Our primary services include Business Process Optimization, IT Application Development, Product Engineering, Data Analytics, Startup Consulting, Digital Transformation Consulting, Product Development (SaaS), Web Application Development, Mobile Application Development, IoT (Internet of Things), AI & ML Application Development and Enterprise Software Development.

Name: Health Catalyst
Description: Health Catalyst is a leading provider of data and analytics technology and services to healthcare organizations, committed to being the catalyst for massive, measurable, data-informed healthcare improvement. Health Catalyst is a leading provider of data and analytics technology and services to healthcare organizations, and is committed to being the catalyst for massive, measurable, data-informed healthcare improvement.  As of December 31, 2019, Health Catalyst served greater than 125 customers including academic medical centers, integrated delivery networks, community hospitals, large physician practices, ACOs, health information exchanges, health insurers, and other risk-bearing entities. Its customers leverage the cloud-based data platform—powered by data from more than 100 million patient records and encompassing trillions of facts—as well as its analytics software and professional services expertise to make data-informed decisions and realize measurable clinical, financial and operational improvements. Health Catalyst envisions a future in which all healthcare decisions are data informed.  Health Catalyst has been recognized by Fortune, Gallup, Glassdoor, Modern Healthcare and others as a best place to work.

Name: Beacon Hill Staffing Group
Description:
Founded by industry leaders to set a new standard in search, career placement and flexible staffing, we deliver coordinated staffing solutions with unparalleled service, a commitment to project completion and success and a passion for innovation, creativity and continuous improvement.

Our niche brands and specialty divisions provide direct hire, executive search, temporary staffing, contract consulting, and temp/contract-to-hire solutions to emerging growth companies and the Fortune 500 across market sectors, career specialties/disciplines, and industries.

Name: Tarang
Description: Tarang Software Technologies wants to be the source for outsourcing. The company serves companies with a need for help with their software programming. Tarang specializes in the development of software that manages payment transactions and related information. Its applications enable account aggregation, multiple payment options, information management, and other features. The business is backed primarily by venture capital firms Global Internet Ventures and Westbridge Capital Partners. Tarang has sales and service partnerships with Microsoft, Sun Microsystems, and IBM among others.

Name: Amnesty International
Description: With nearly half a century of work behind it, Amnesty International strives to promote human rights around the world. It has more than 2.2 million members, chapters in more than 80 countries, and supporters and donors from more than 150 countries and territories in every region of the world. Having won the Nobel Peace Prize in 1977, the organization continues to campaign against such things as torture, the death penalty, and other human rights violations. British lawyer Peter Benenson, who died in 2005, founded Amnesty International as a letter-writing campaign in 1961 as a reaction to the incarceration of two Portuguese students who had toasted to freedom.

Name: iFocus Systec
Description:
iFocus Systec specializes in DEVELOPMENT, TESTING, EXECUTION and MANAGEMENT OF BUSINESS CRITICAL IT INFRASTRUCTURE - ensuring the entire ITOps landscape. Founded in 2007, iFocus (ISO 9001:2008 certified) has well-developed practices in App Development, Management and Integration Services, Product Engineering, Mobility Applications and BI. 

iFocus assists companies achieve Faster to Market strategies and driving down operational cost with high quality Product Engineering and end to end QA Services across key industry domains including HealthCare, Communication, Media and Entertainment, Digital mobility and Transportation. 

IFocus’s unique point of view around SMART Requirements, SMART Automation and Consumption Driven Models enables clients to embark the journey of Dev Ops with ease and predictability of results. iFocus engages with its customers through flexible delivery models, customized to suit specific business environments and management of client services through ODC and OTC..

Name: FreshersLive
Description: FreshersLive - No.1 Job site in India. Here you can find latest 2022 government as well as private job recruitment notifications for different posts vacancies in India. Get top company jobs for both fresher and experienced. Job Seekers can get useful interview tips, resume services & interview Question and answer. Practice online test free which is helpful for interview preparation. Register with us to get latest employment news/rojgar samachar notifications. Also get latest free govt and other sarkari naukri job alerts daily through E-mail.

Name: Khan Academy
Description: Khan Academy is a 501(c)3 non‐profit with a mission of providing a free world‐class education for anyone, anywhere. Our free online educational resources include practice problems, instructional lessons, and learning tools to support personalized education for users of all ages. It doesn't matter if you are a student, teacher, home-schooler, principal, or a friendly alien just trying to get a leg up in earthly biology. Khan Academy's materials and resources are available to you completely free of charge.

Name: Teikametrics
Description:
Teikametrics is an ecommerce optimization platform that wants to democratize retail.  

We’re a diverse group of individuals who champion passion, character, and talent as the core tenets to creating profitable and long-lasting businesses. Central to Teikametrics' success is our unwavering commitment to our core belief system. We believe in ownership, craftsmanship, empathy, curiosity, and initiative.  

Do you have the unquenchable urge to create amazing things and make a real difference for sellers? Do you need to see your ideas come to reality? Are you crazy passionate about your area of expertise? If so, we'd love to grab a *virtual* coffee sometime.

Name: Air Canada
Description: Air Canada is Canada's largest full-service airline and the largest provider of scheduled passenger services in the Canadian market, the Canada-U.S. transborder market and in the international market to and from Canada. Together with its Air Canada Express regional partners, Air Canada serves close to 35 million passengers annually and provides direct passenger service to more than 175 destinations on five continents. Air Canada is a founding member of Star Alliance™, the world's most comprehensive air transportation network.

Name: LHH
Description:
In today’s marketplace, organizations are discovering the need to turn their attention inward to find their future talent. At LHH, we help companies see the possibilities in their people. Through assessments, coaching, upskilling and transitioning, companies can realize the untapped potential within their own workforce, resulting in increased productivity, morale, and brand affinity.

A division of The Adecco Group—the world’s leading HR solutions partner—LHH’s 4,000 coaches and colleagues work with more than 7,000 organizations in over 60 countries around the world. We make a difference to everyone we work with, and we do it on a global scale. We have the local expertise, global infrastructure, and industry-leading technology to manage the complexity of critical workforce initiatives and the challenges of transformation. It’s why 60% of the Fortune 500 companies choose to work with us. Learn more at www.lhh.com.

Name: MACOM
Description: MACOM is a new breed of analog semiconductor company—one that delivers a unique combination of high growth, diversification and high profitability. We are enabling a better-connected and safer world by delivering breakthrough semiconductor technologies for optical, wireless and satellite networks that satisfy society’s insatiable demand for information.

Name: 3CLogic
Description:
3CLogic is a provider of cloud communication as a service, integrating voice communication/telephony with service management platforms and systems of record. We enable enterprises to modernize legacy infrastructure in the cloud (pure and hybrid), achieve extensive change control and complete visibility into internal and external customer communications.  
What makes us successful, our customers successful and differentiates us from our competitors is how we execute on enabling enterprises to run a business, not a technology.
We tightly integrate and weave our own telephony (voice) engine that we built into the fabric of the cloud CRM/systems of record with 100% Amazon Web Services (AWS) architecture. No one competitor of ours has these two characteristics: 100% cloud and proprietary telephony engine. These are the key differentiators that attract enterprise customers to our solution.

Name: Kanini
Description:
KANINI is a digital transformation enabler, providing cutting-edge software services and solutions that help enterprises drive innovation and business growth. We create impeccable customer experiences through thoughtfully designed digital solutions that help improve our customer’s efficiency, scale, and revenues.

We specialize in Product Engineering, Data Analytics & AI, and ServiceNow Consultation and Implementation. We focus on empowering Banking & Financial Services, Healthcare, Manufacturing, and a few other industries to leverage new-age technologies and solutions by implementing agile development practices and a global delivery framework.

We build technology that puts humans first - in line with our core operating principle of 'technology is for people, not the other way around'. The result is happier clients, partners, and employees.

How do we do this? - It's by ensuring our customers’ needs are well-balanced with our people’s aspirations. It means:

* We care for everyone we work with.
* We value every relationship we create.
* We treat our clients as partners.

Our people come to work because it makes them happy. They feel at home and smile more often. They keep getting better at what they do, every day!

If all this is just as important to you, bring us your Energy, Intellect, and Integrity. We’ll offer you a happier way to work.

Explore Careers at KANINI: https://bit.ly/3A8SQC6

Name: AuroIN
Loction: Headquarters in New York, United States

Name: PM AM
Description:
PM AM Corporation is a global information technology company headquartered in Dallas, Texas.  Through our additional offices in Houston, TX, and Mumbai, India; we are available to serve customers night (PM) and day (AM.)

Currently, PM AM Corporation has a total of four divisions:  False Alarm Management, Human Capital Management, Customer Relationship Management, and Offshore Software Development.  The common thread across all four divisions is a commitment to reducing customer costs, offering world class customer service, and corporate social responsibility.

We currently serve a wide range of customers in the government (cities, counties, and police departments) and private sector.

Name: Arctern
Loction: Arctern Consulting Pvt. Ltd., 4th floor, 410/381/290, Siddappa Layout, Madiwala Post, Bommanahalli, Bengaluru – 560068 Karnataka, India
Description:
Working at Arctern
Whether you are a seasoned professional or a new graduate, Arctern believes that keeping employees fulfilled professionally is the key to a vibrant, dynamic organization.

We foster a work culture that values the individual, nurtures professional development, and encourages creativity and innovation. At Arctern, you will get all the resources, tools, and specialized training you need to achieve your full potential and progress your career. Working in an open environment that encourages a healthy work-life balance, you will work with highly motivated colleagues who share our commitment to quality service and innovative thinking.

Our services span multiple practices areas, which means you will have opportunities to move into new roles of interest to you within the organization. What’s more, we don’t keep new employees on the sidelines. Most likely you’ll get to work on important projects that will help you gain international exposure. You will learn new skills on the job as well as through formal training programs.

We offer competitive compensation packages, invest in progressive HR practices, and continually review and develop our HR strategy through inputs gathered from in-depth employee satisfaction surveys.

In sum, at Arctern we don’t just offer jobs. We offer rewarding careers.

Know Who we are
Founded in late 2004, Arctern is a global services company serving the needs of businesses worldwide with the purpose of bridging the global workforce.

Competitive Edge
Committed to improving its customers’ profitability, Arctern provides skilled manpower resources, infrastructure, and management for various practice areas including software development, engineering, web design, technical support, call center operations, sales and marketing, customer service, research, and back-office accounting and administration. With significant industry and business experience, global resources, and a pioneering business model called RemoteHire®, Arctern can help quickly, easily, and affordably, deploy the right people, projects, and infrastructure to meet the business objectives of small and large companies.

Since 2004, Arctern has successfully implemented the offshore outsourcing model for numerous companies across USA. Our current objective and scope of work is four folds:

For Developed Markets:
To bridge the need of businesses in developed nations which are facing a competitive disadvantage from their respective market leaders with regards to lower operational cost structures due to the benefits of offshore outsourcing of skilled human resources.
To expand the service or product offerings of businesses from developed nations to developing markets in Asia, Middle East, South America, and Africa.
For Developing Markets:
To bridge the need of businesses in developing nations which are growing to provide easy, one-stop access to infrastructure and skilled manpower resources in developed markets.
To expand the service or product offerings of businesses from developing nations to developed markets in North America, Europe, Asia, & Australia.
Company Background
Arctern's founder Bijal Mehta is a pioneering entrepreneur with more than 20 years of experience in setting up and managing successful enterprises both in India and the US. Bijal ranks among the early entrepreneurs to leverage the cost and skillset benefits of an India-US workforce model to build innovative software products for a global audience when he started iCode in the 90's. His dream was to bring this advantage of developing markets to all customers whether large or small and access to developed markets for growing companies in developing markets. It is with this vision that he started Arctern in 2004.

Under his leadership Arctern is expanding its presence in global staffing & infrastructure services and driving its growth strategy based on a global customer centric approach. Arctern is ISO 9001 and ISO 27001 certified and uses the industries best standards and practices in their services.

Volt: Our Parent Company
Volt Information Sciences, Inc. (www.volt.com) is Arctern's parent company.

Founded in 1950, Volt is a leading provider of global infrastructure solutions in technology, information services and staffing acquisition for its Fortune 100 customer base.

Volt's workforce solutions include contract labor sourcing, professional search, managed services programs, vendor management systems and recruitment process outsourcing. Volt combines consultative focus, Six Sigma practices and efficient e-procurement technologies to deliver the talent and processes that help our customers succeed.

Operating through an international network of servicing locations, the staffing segment fulfills IT, engineering, administrative, and industrial workforce requirements of its customers, for both professional search and temporary/contingent personnel as well as managed services programs and Recruitment Process Outsourcing (RPO) services.

Key facts
Founded: 1950
Ownership: Public
Revenue: $1.0  billion
Offices: More than 80  locations, nationally and globally. Employees in every U.S. state, plus locations in Canada, Europe, South America and Asia                               
Employees:  16,100 professionals including approximately 22,500 who work on contingent staffing.
Clients: 40 percent of Fortune 100
 
Volt Businesses
Volt Workforce Solutions
Volt Workforce Solutions (VWS) offers contingent staffing, direct placement, and managed services throughout North America. VWS provide flexible, scalable solutions to companies of every size, from small firms needing a few specialists to enterprise accounts that require hundreds or even thousands of contingent workers across numerous skill sets with coordinated account management at multiple locations.

Volt Consulting Group
Volt Consulting Group (VCG) is an independent managed services provider (MSP) with a proven 20 year record of helping leading organizations to recruit and manage top quality contingent talent to fill specialized skill needs, meet peak labor demands and even outsource non-critical operations.  More than 100 Fortune 1000 and emerging companies rely on Volt’s MSP services to improve the value and manage the costs of their staffing suppliers, statement of work projects and independent contractors while ensuring greater visibility and helping to mitigate the risks of this growing portion of their total workforce.

Volt Asia
Volt Asia, with offices in Singapore and Taiwan, offers flexible staffing and search services that help companies of any size efficiently and effectively improve their recruiting results. Volt specializes in identifying and delivering candidates who have the expertise and experience our Client’s seek and the personality and motivation to fit the culture of our Customer’s organization.

Volt Europe
Volt Europe is a specialist recruitment company, providing high-quality and customized staffing services across Europe, ranging from contract and permanent recruitment solutions to managed staffing programs. Volt Europe too offers contingent staffing, direct placement, and managed services throughout Europe from offices in the UK, Belgium, and France. In Europe’s mature, highly competitive marketplace, our experienced consultants give clients a competitive edge by providing proven workforce management expertise and unsurpassed understanding of local and regional markets.

Volt India
Arctern provides Optimal Workflow Design and Scalable Workforce Distribution. We analyze and document current state processes, recommend strategies for efficiency, and deliver technology and service solutions that sharpen our Customer’s competitive edge. Arctern delivers efficient, cost-effective, flexible solutions. Offerings range from Software Development, Application Maintenance & Technology Integration to Business process Optimization.

Name: Neutrinos
Description:
We are Neutrinos, a Rapid Application Development Platform company, started our journey from Johannesburg. We are a team of Passionate, talented, and self-driven individuals with profound domain expertise and 100+ years of combined industry experiences. 

Neutrinos is the fastest low code RAD platform in the market that helps enterprises, and citizen developers build omni-channel applications rapidly.

Name: Ashiana Housing
Description:
We, Ashiana Housing Ltd. (AHL), are an Indian real estate development company established in 1979 with its head office in New Delhi, India. We are the only real estate company to be recognized by Forbes as Asia's 200 Best Under A Billion (2010 and 2011). We are mid-income housing developer with primary focus on Kid Centric Home, Senior Living & Care Homes (i.e. assisted living) for the elderly. 

At Ashiana, we believe, that trust and respect is earned through actions and not through words. For over three decades, this belief has pushed us to strive harder and create higher benchmarks in delivery and service. We have built and delivered over 210 lakhs square feet of residential and commercial space in Delhi NCR, Rajasthan, Haryana, Jharkhand & Pune. In the process, we have provided homes to thousand of families from past 40 years, who placed their faith in our quality of construction, safety of investment and integrity of commitment.

Name: Brown-Forman
Description: For more than 150 years, Brown‑Forman Corporation has enriched the experience of life by responsibly building fine quality beverage alcohol brands, including Jack Daniel's Tennessee Whiskey, Jack Daniel's Tennessee RTDs, Jack Daniel's Tennessee Honey, Jack Daniel's Tennessee Fire, Jack Daniel's Tennessee Apple, Gentleman Jack, Jack Daniel's Single Barrel, Woodford Reserve, Old Forester, Coopers’ Craft, The GlenDronach, Benriach, Glenglassaugh, Slane, Herradura, el Jimador, New Mix, Korbel, Sonoma‑Cutrer, Finlandia, Chambord, Fords Gin, Gin Mare, and Diplomático Rum. Brown‑Forman’s brands are supported by approximately 5,200 employees globally and sold in more than 170 countries worldwide. For more information about the company, please visit brown-forman.com. Follow us on LinkedIn, Instagram, and Twitter.

Name: Swift Transportation
Description:
Swift Transportation operates a tractor fleet with over 14,000 units driven by company and owner-operator drivers. The company operates more than 40 major terminals positioned near major freight centers and traffic lanes in the United States and Mexico.

From those who are looking to obtain a successful truck driving career, shop mechanics, operations support and customer service to finance, sales, information technology and human resources, we are always looking for ambitious, professional employees to help make Swift not only a leader in transportation, but also a great place to work.

Find your career today with Swift Transportation!

Name: Beat
Description:
At Beat, we believe that technology can change the world. We work in small, autonomous teams following agile methodologies. When it comes to having a meaningful job, we believe in Dan Pink's work motivation principle: our teams have to possess Autonomy, Mastery, and Purpose.


Our goal is to be efficient and develop groundbreaking technologies that improve the lives of people in the cities we operate in. You will work among stunning colleagues; people who are so passionate about their work that will motivate you to unleash your potential.

We provide unlimited access to learning and opportunities to grow, along with competitive compensation packages. Beat’s headquarters are based in Athens Greece, with another European hub in Amsterdam while additional with our operations teams  located in  Lima, Santiago, Bogota, Buenos Aires and Mexico City with many more soon to come.

Name: Webtel Electrosoft
Description:
First company to launch ‘e’ TDS product in 2004 when Income Tax Department made it mandatory for Corporates to file their TDS Returns in electronic format.
India’s Leading ‘e’ Compliance Solutions Company engaged in providing Compliance Solutions.
Led by expert team of professionals turned entrepreneurs consisting of C.A., CS, Legal and Software professionals.
Pioneer in ‘e’ compliance solutions for Income Tax, MCA, GST etc.
Participated in every ‘e’ compliance initiative of Govt. of India and launched products for professionals and Corporates.

Webtel Electrosoft Pvt. Ltd is a 21 years old company and it is engaged in providing complete Software and Knowledge Process Outsourcing Solutions and a host of other IT Enabled Services. We have presence in Delhi, Mumbai, Kolkata, Ahmedabad, Hyderabad, Chennai ,Punjab & Bangalore.
THE EDGE 
Incorporated in year 2000, Webtel journey began and progressed with providing Software Solutions for 'e' Compliance. Our perfection and customer centric approach made our privileged customers to motivate us for diversifying into many more products and services in addition to Compliance Products. Professionals from the field of Chartered Accountancy, Company Secretaries and Legal people who were passionate at heart to provide best to fraternity and industry and minds of IT Professionals worked together to make this company stand apart from the crowd.
From 1 location in year 2000 to PAN India presence in year 2021, from a small team of 7 people to a team of around 450 people, from 1 product to more than 20 products, entire team is working tirelessly to remain the Leading Position. Because we chant and practice "Customer is Supreme" mantra every day, therefore, we are among Top Taxation Software Providers in India, with more than 35000 satisfied customers with us and number is ever increasing. Our software packages have been widely appreciated and recommended by reputed Companies and CA firms.

Name: Coherent Market Insights
Description:
Coherent Market Insights is a global market intelligence and consulting organization focused on assisting our plethora of clients achieve transformational growth by helping them make critical business decisions. We are headquartered in India, having office at global financial capital in the U.S. Our client base includes players from across all business verticals in over 150 countries worldwide. We are uniquely positioned to help businesses around the globe deliver practical and lasting results through various recommendations about operational improvements, technologies, emerging market trends and new working methods. We offer both customized and syndicated market research reports that help our clients create visionary growth plans to provide traction to their business.  Few of the services offered by Coherent Market Insights Include:

•	Customized Research

Name: Trilogy Health Services
Description:
Careers close to home and your heart.

We’re a Fortune Best Places to Work in Aging Services, a certified Great Place to Work, and one of Glassdoor’s Top 100 Best Companies to Work. Name: Abcam
Description:
At abcam, we believe the scientific community goes further, faster when we go there together. 

And to keep on making ground-breaking discoveries, we need to work together in new ways. That’s 
why we’re constantly innovating to help scientists drive their research forward by providing products 
and solutions that play an essential role in fundamental research, drug discovery, diagnostic and 
therapeutic applications.

We started with a simple mission: to provide the best biological reagents to life scientists worldwide. 
Today, we help 750,000 researchers in over 130 countries deliver faster breakthroughs in areas like 
cancer, neurological disorders, infectious diseases, and metabolic disorders.

Name: Biofourmis
Description: Biofourmis brings the right care to every person, no matter where they are. The company’s AI-driven solution collects and analyzes patient data in real time and identifies shifts that require proactive interventions. This vital innovation provides people everywhere with connected access to hospital-level services, virtual provider networks for remote care, and life-changing clinical trials—all without leaving their homes. Trusted by leading health systems, payers, biopharma companies and patients alike, Biofourmis’ connected platform improves patient outcomes, prevents hospital readmissions, accelerates drug development, and closes critical gaps in care—ultimately making science smarter, healthcare simpler, and patients healthier. Biofourmis is a global technology company enabling care delivery, with headquarters in Boston and key offices in Singapore and India.

Name: SCIEX
Description: SCIEX helps to improve the quality of life around the world by enabling scientists and laboratory analysts to find answers to the complex analytical challenges they face. Our global leadership and world-class service and support in the capillary electrophoresis and liquid chromatography-mass spectrometry industry have made us a trusted partner to thousands of customers worldwide who are focused on basic research, drug discovery and development, food and environmental testing, forensics and clinical research.

Name: Saarthi
Loction: Indiqube Octagon, Site No.643, 80 Feet Road, 4th Block, Koramangala
Description:
“If you want to walk fast, walk alone. But if you want to walk far, walk together."
-Ratan Tata

To achieve something monumental, you need to work with people who carry this mindset. They not only lay the foundation but act as pillars for the mission.

At Saarthi.ai, we apply this saying in our daily lives. We are like a close-knit family as well as a passionate squad.

We at Saarthi.ai don’t call one another Employees but we call ourselves Team Members. We believe we are part of a Team, and our roles and responsibilities extend beyond ‘tasks’. We work ‘with’ everyone and ‘for’ the Purpose!

The Team is comprised of members from various parts of the nation and different walks of life. And we all play together to achieve common goals. We believe such diversity and inclusion builds a winning culture as well as great products.

Saarthi.ai goes about its mission while ensure the future its building is sustainable. The company is focussed on being the world’s leading Contact Center AI company, while keeping privacy, environment and advancement of humanity as its core values.

Saarthi.ai is a Purpose First and People Centric company.

How was this juggernaut built? Every day, people are joining the mission to:

· Upskill themselves- Collaborate with curious, hard-working people (great minds) to learn, contribute, and evolve together.

· Grow faster- Utilize the steep learning curve and challenges to accelerate your personal and professional development. Get closer to achieving your true potential as a person.

· Own Great Responsibilities- Get to feel the impact of what you are doing. Rather than seeing things as individual tasks, you get the platform at Saarthi.ai to know what purpose is your work fulfilling.

· Co-create the Future- You are not just updated with the current times but you are actively changing the status quo (current times) and building the future.

· Make Change Happen - Every life has a purpose. Here, you are able to directly effect changes that make the world a better place. You are able to make a better tomorrow. You are able to leave your mark on the times. Here, you get the chance to fulfil your purpose with all that you do.

· Meet their Crazy - You don't get to meet crazy people everyday with crazy ideas. People will generally go from 1 to 2 but not 1 to 100. Such people accelerate/propel even your dreams / growth. And, they are approachable, like minded and you are gathered for a common purpose. So, you are able to discuss/reason/argue and make even that idea crazier (better). If people describe you as crazy or a misfit, you are in the right place. Come for the purpose ; Stay for the people.

· Generate Wealth - You join when the mission is at its early stages or the company is many orders of magnitude less of its true potential. And, when you make it big together, you have played a part in shaping it and creating value for everyone. This generates wealth and a sense of accomplishment. At Saarthi.ai, we have an All ESOP policy – which means every member of the company owns a part of the company.

· Do Good - Everyone wants to do good. Everyone has some values/ethics or initiatives they care about. Our core values extend even beyond our work in artificial intelligence. Our gene of innovation helps us lasts the test of time even as the company goes through multiple stages of growth. A bigger company is a vehicle for us to effect bigger change by staying true to our core values and building great products that make things better/change the way people do things in their daily lives.

No matter what stage we are in, that fire will always keep burning. To live up to that promise, we abide by our 7 Core Values.

These values help us improve with every passing day.

o Advance Humanity
o Be Inclusive
o Deliver Value
o Work Better
o Environment Matters
o Respect Privacy
o Embrace Adventure

If you relate with any of these core values, then we are meant to be.

At Saarthi.ai you’ll witness a positive and growth-oriented work culture. Here you’ll be able to feel the Work-Life Balance as there is no fixed working hour system, the company works on a system of totally work-based timings. Moreover, every team member can avail Work from Home benefit as well (2 days a week max). Other benefits include various career-based growth programs for the team members which team members can pursue on the go while working in the office. Last but not least, there are also regular excursions/offsites planned for the team members and some wild parties.

They say work is worship. They say play is essential!

Name: Aviso
Description:
Aviso is the AI-powered Compass to help Sales and Go-to-Market teams close more deals, accelerate growth, and find their revenue True North. We do this with a next generation AI platform to supercharge guided selling. Our premise, proven at multi-billion-dollar revenue businesses, is that AI can drive better revenue outcomes than simply relying on human judgment alone or raw data scattered across CRM, customer success tools, data lakes, and other customer data repositories.

With demonstrated results across Fortune 500 companies and industry leaders such as Dell, Honeywell, Splunk, MongoDB, and RingCentral, Aviso works at the frontier of predictive AI to help teams close more deals and drive more revenue. Aviso is backed by Storm Ventures, Scale Venture Partners, Shasta Ventures, and other leading Silicon Valley investors.

Name: Apptivo
Description: Apptivo is a cloud-based software product that offers an integrated suite of business applications that is used by businesses of all sizes, ranging from one user to thousands. Apptivo’s mission is to offer an affordable and easy to use solution for businesses to collaborate with customers and partners. Our industry-leading solution has grown substantially in this time and so have our clients. Over 150,000 businesses in 193 countries now rely on Apptivo for their CRM Software, Project Management, Invoicing and communication needs.

Name: Petpooja
Description:
Petpooja is India’s leading restaurant management platform. Powering over 55,000+ restaurants across India, Middle East, Canada, and South Africa.

We offer a holistic cloud-based restaurant  POS that includes multiple functionalities like:

1. Billing
2. Inventory
3. Reporting
4. Online Order management
5. Menu management
6. CRM
and much more.

Petpooja has integrated 200+ third-party integrations like Zomato, Paytm, Tally, Swiggy, and much more so that you can manage multiple things on a single dashboard. 

We cater to various restaurant brands, from independent to multi-chain outlets like La Pino’z, Hocco Eatery, Jumbo King, Apsara Ice cream, Giani’s, Kailash Parbat, TGIF, The Beer Cafe, Honest, Yum Yum Cha, Anjappar & more. Whether you are a cloud kitchen or a large chain restaurant, Cafe, or QSR, Petpooja has got you covered. We have a ground presence in more than 200+ cities across India and provide 24x7 customer support.


We have recently collaborated with Paytm to launch our two new products:

1. Petpooja GO: The power of Petpooja Pos working in Paytm Device plus Payment Integration is Petpooja Go. Highly recommended for outlets with small space and no hardware. 


2. Petpooja PAY: Collect payments super fast and secure your restaurant transactions while avoiding Cash leakages and Payment fraud with a handy Paytm device. Recommended for outlets with high payment pilferage 


We're on a mission to build a robust & reliable ecosystem for restaurants in India and solve restaurant management worries for all our restaurant partners and enabling them to grow their businesses sustainably. If you wish to get in touch, call us at: 7046223344 or inquiry@petpooja.com

Name: Fyers

Description: Smartsheet is a dynamic workspace that empowers teams to manage projects, automate workflows, and rapidly build new solutions—using no-code tools they love, and backed by the security IT needs.

Name: LivePlanet
Loction: Headquarters in Santa Monica, United States
Description: Production company LivePlanet's projects include a mixture of documentaries, television shows, and new-media initiatives. The firm formerly produced the HBO (and later Showtime) series Project Greenlight, designed to find and help new filmmakers. Other LivePlanet credits include the feature films American Wedding and Matchstick Men. Hollywood stars Matt Damon and Ben Affleck founded the company along with entertainment executive Chris Moore. LivePlanet was founded in 2000; its production deal with Disney expired at the end of 2007, when the company closed its film division.

Name: Ubiquiti
Description:
At Ubiquiti Inc., we create technology platforms for Businesses, Smart Homes, and Internet Service Providers, driven by our goal to connect everyone, everywhere. To date, Ubiquiti has shipped over 100 million devices worldwide, from ISP networking products to next generation of IT solutions. Our growth is made possible by the dedicated team of hundreds behind the scenes. From software developers and product managers to designers and strategists, Team UI is driven to achieve our common goal: Simplifying IT.

At Ubiquiti, you’ll heighten your potential and broaden your horizons—all while shaping the future of connectivity. We invite you to join our team at careers.ui.com.

Name: REHAU
Description:
We’re here today because one man pursued his idea for doing something different. He built a manufacturing company that engineers progress with polymer-based solutions to enhance lives.  Founded in Rehau, Germany, the independent, family-owned company has 21,500 employees in more than 190 locations around the globe.

Dare to do something different, every day.

We make and move real things, clearing a way to secure forever customers. We want to nurture your individual spirit, spark curiosity and ignite the passion within you. When you are inspired, we all benefit. 

Each day is unique; jump in and carve your own path.  As a global work family of doers, we collaborate, celebrate each other’s victories and encourage honest feedback to be true to our customers, our teammates and ourselves. Take the lead, get your hands dirty and make something better today.

Name: Palantir Technologies
Description:
At Palantir (NYSE: PLTR), we're helping the world's most important institutions use their data to solve their most urgent problems. Our software lets our customers integrate and analyze all of their data so they can answer questions that they couldn't before. From delivering disaster relief to building safer automobiles, we're honored to help make our partners better at their most important work. 

Together with our customers, we're building the future of national security, healthcare, energy, finance, manufacturing, and more. And we need bright minds from around the world to help us.

Palantir is headquartered in Denver, CO, with offices around the world, including New York, London, Washington, DC,  Seattle, and Tokyo.

Name: Crave InfoTech
Description: Crave InfoTech, 2018 ACE Award Winner and 2015 Pinnacle award finalist is an independent software solutions vendor (ISSV), a trusted Zebra partner, Here Technologies partner, Google partner, diversity supplier, SAP VAR, and member of the global SAP PartnerEdge program with a Build specialization. Crave InfoTech is also an ISO 9000–certified global software and technology services company headquartered in New Jersey. It provides services in SAP UI and UX, SAP ERP, Cloud Enablement, the Internet of Things, Enterprise Mobility, Machine Learning, and Blockchain.

Name: BPM

BPM LLP is one of the 50 largest public accounting and advisory firms in the country. With more than 800 team members across the U.S. — as well as an office in Bengaluru, India — we help clients succeed around the world. We offer a cross-functional approach that gives clients direct access to the best and most qualified resources. 

From financial services, technology, life science and consumer business to real estate, nonprofits, wine and craft beverages, we are committed to the success of our clients. Our International Tax Practice is one of the largest on the West Coast and our well-recognized SEC Practice serves dozens public reporting companies.

We have been honored as one of the “Best Public Accounting Firms for Women” by the Accounting &  American Women’s Society of CPAs (AWSCPA).  We ranked #22 on Vault’s 2021 “Accounting 50” list in 2020 and Forbes names BPM one of America’s Top Recommended Tax and Accounting Firms.

Interactions is a virtual company allowing employees to work from anywhere in the US.

Interactions provides Intelligent Virtual Assistants that seamlessly combine artificial intelligence and human understanding to enable businesses and consumers to engage in productive conversations. With flexible products and solutions designed to meet the growing demand for unified, multichannel customer care, Interactions is delivering significant cost savings and unprecedented customer experience for some of the largest brands in the world. 

For more information, visit www.interactions.com.

Our flagship brand, The Times of India, is the world’s largest selling English daily, and The Economic Times is the world’s 2nd largest English Daily after Wall Street Journal. 
Innovation is the core value of our organization and we have many firsts in the industry to our credit. 
This innovation in our DNA has ensured that we consistently grew faster than Sensex in the last 25 years.
