A remote-first company, Blackbaud has operations in the United States, Australia, Canada, Costa Rica and the United Kingdom, supporting users in 100+ countries. Learn more at blackbaud.com or follow us on LinkedIn, Twitter and Instagram.

Name: Student Beans
Description:
Student Beans is a global student discount platform and media company. We provide over 1,000 consumer brands with student verification technology to run their own student discount programs, and aggregate student discounts on our consumer website.
 We also offer media solutions for consumer brands, and create original content for students across web and social media. Our mission is to "empower students to thrive" and act as a "gateway to success with Gen Z" for consumer brands.  
With over 250 employees across the UK, US, Australia and the Philippines, we’ve gone to great lengths to create an exceptional, employee-centric culture.

At Student Beans, we have a thrilling and exciting journey ahead, with ambitious goals and incredible possibilities. We are looking for great people, who want to be part of something amazing, to join us.

Name: Jeevan Technologies
Description:
Jeevan Technologies has been on the growth path, with path-breaking aesthetic IT solutions ever since it stepped into the industry in the year 2000. Having offices in Brentwood, Tennessee, USA and Chennai, India; Jeevan empowers its workforce to deliver solutions exceeding customer expectations across the globe. At Jeevan, business goals are strategically designed towards building value to customers through products and services. Over the years, our identity has evolved as we have embraced the new technologies in line with the changing global dynamics.

One of the best brands in the industry with a blend of technical competencies, proven methodologies and exceptional customer services.

Jeevan’s team has spread across the globe supporting onsite and offshore services seamlessly. The company’s diversified work culture has enabled successful  partnerships with several leading organizations globally.

Our Journey of Excellence
--------------------------
When we began in the year 2000, we were a determined group of passionate IT professionals who wanted to be recognized not for our size, but for our expertise. Our vision was to be recognized as a company that could provide solutions, services and products that were cost-effective, innovative and customized. Over the years, we’ve realized that vision and more! 

We have successfully completed many projects where we started from vague and incomplete specification. Our strength is our team of specialists whose professionalism has always prevailed on the fore in any situation.

From 2000 to 2004, we were a consulting company that helped clients with ideas and initiatives. Soon, our clients were requesting our services and we turned to service delivery in 2005, going on to developing products in 2007. Today, we have delighted clientele in all three core areas.

We don’t just deliver projects. We deliver ‘Value’ to customer and work towards customer delight. 

Capability / Specialization: 
Cloud Computing, Product Development, Enterprise Mobility, ADMS, Visual Excellence, CRM, Software Testing, Resource On Demand, Salesforce Technologies, IT Consulting Services, Mule Soft, ServiceNow, Full Stack Developer, TOSCA testing, IT Staffing , SAP, Salesforce, RPA, Tableau, Selenium automation, and MS Dynamics

Name: MST Solutions
Description: Founded in 2012, MST Solutions is a Salesforce Crest partner and a certified MuleSoft partner that helps clients achieve their business outcomes with enterprise-level digital solutions. Our services center around Salesforce Cloud Services, CRM Implementation and Integration, and marketing automation. And as we grew over the years, our client base expanded to include the public sector, finance, manufacturing, nonprofit, higher education, and healthcare industries. Nine years later, we are still growing, with nearly 40% of our employees being women counterparts. MST is also committed to philanthropic efforts through the Pledge 1% movement.

Name: Sharp Corporation
Description: Sharp's business is pointed at the electronics market. Best known for its consumer electronics, the company is also a leading maker of electronic components and computer hardware and peripherals. Its flagship components business makes LCDs (used in everything from airplane cockpits to PCs to pinball machines), flash memory, laser diodes, and optical sensors. Sharp also makes printers and cell phones; consumer audio and video products, such as Blu-ray disc players and LCD TVs; and a variety of appliances, such as air purifiers and steam ovens. The company is one of the world's largest manufacturers of photovoltaic solar cells.

Name: Cox Automotive
Description:
There’s nothing ordinary about Cox Automotive. We are people of every background driven by our passion for mobility, innovation, client success and community outreach. We make buying, selling, owning and using cars easier for everyone. Touching more than 40,000 clients across five continents, we bring together the best brands and the best teams to propel the automotive industry forward. Some of those team members work for our iconic and groundbreaking consumer brands like Autotrader ® and Kelley Blue Book®, while others are creating the future of automotive at industry-facing brands like Dealer.com ®, Manheim ®, NextGear Capital ®, vAuto ® and Xtime®.

Cox Automotive is part of Cox Enterprises, a privately-owned, Atlanta-based company with revenues exceeding $20 billion.  Across the broader Cox family of businesses, we’re empowering our people to build a better future for the next generation. Our social impact initiative, 34 by 34, is aimed at removing obstacles and expanding access to programs that will help 34 million people live more prosperous and fulfilling lives by 2034. From bridging the digital divide to addressing social equity and environmental sustainability challenges, we’re committed to growing the good in the communities we serve, one action at a time. Watch this video to learn more: https://bit.ly/3LEHmtN.

We are a global,  family-owned organization with a purpose.  We offer a culture with flexible career growth, generous benefits and an environment where you’re empowered to make time for teammates, family, friends and yourself. Come build a better future with us and make your mark.

Name: AppVenturez
Loction: 1st Floor, Plot No - D-5, D Block, Logix Infotech Park, Sector 59, Noida, Uttar Pradesh
Description: Appventurez Mobitech Pvt. Ltd. is a leading Software Development company which was established with a motto of imparting end-to-end technology oriented services to all large and small businesses and bestow enormously in enhancing their overall business lifecycle.

Name: Abu Dhabi Commercial Bank
Loction: Headquarters in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates

Name: HashStudioz
Description: HashStudioz is a digital transformation consultancy and software development company that provides cutting edge engineering solutions to help companies and enterprises decipher complex issues that always emerge during their digital evolution journey. Specialized in both Web and Mobile, HashStudioz fulfills all the needs of its customers starting from Consultant to UX/UI Design, Application Design & Development, Machine Learning, Artifical Intelligence, IoT Solutions, Industrial Automation Solutions, Blockchain Application Development to name a few.

Name: SPAN Technology Services
Description: We're an end to end Agile Software Product Development company, covering concept, design, programming and digital marketing.

Name: Roblox
Description:
Roblox is a platform where people come together virtually to share experiences. Every day, tens of millions of people from around the world come to Roblox to play, learn, work, and socialize in immersive digital experiences all built by a global community of creators.

Roblox engineers are working on the most complex problems in tech today―distributed systems, real-time communication, 3D co-experience, massive data processing, social networking, rendering, physics, and more. The breadth of technical opportunities, and the evolving demands of this first-of-its-kind platform, ensure that avenues for growth are constantly expanding and flexible.

To explore open roles, visit: https://careers.roblox.com/.

Name: Westernacher Consulting
Description:
Founded in 1969, Westernacher Consulting operates worldwide, with consultants in Europe, Asia and the Americas. Westernacher provides global business and SAP consulting, serving medium to large sized enterprises striving for innovation, operational excellence and profitable, sustainable growth. 

Westernacher has comprehensive industry expertise in manufacturing, logistics services, retail & consumer goods, life sciences and utilities. The company’s business expertise ranges from enterprise resource planning, sales, e-commerce, procurement, manufacturing, warehouse logistics and transportation, after sales service and spare parts management to business analytics, finance and HCM.

Name: GIC
Description:
GIC is a leading global investment firm established in 1981 to manage Singapore’s foreign reserves. A disciplined long-term value investor, GIC is uniquely positioned for investments across a wide range of asset classes, including equities, fixed income, private equity, real estate and infrastructure. 

GIC has investments in over 40 countries and has been investing in emerging markets for more than two decades. Headquartered in Singapore, GIC employs over 1,400 people across 10 offices in key financial cities worldwide. 

For more information on GIC, please visit www.gic.com.sg.

Name: vTech Solution
Loction: 1100 H St NW, STE 750, Washington, DC, 20005-5479
Description: vTechFamily Solution India Pvt. Ltd. is an IT Outsourcing Services firm, based out of Vadodara, with a primary focus on Staffing and IT Consulting Services.

Name: DSW
Description:
DSW Inc. is a leading branded footwear and accessories retailer that offers a wide selection of brand name and designer dress, casual and athletic footwear and accessories for women, men and kids. DSW operates 431 stores in 42 states, the District of Columbia and Puerto Rico, as well as 370 leased departments.. We also operate an e-commerce site, http://www.dsw.com, and a mobile site, http://m.dsw.com. 

DSW customers are brand, value quality and style conscious shoppers who have a passion for footwear and accessories. Our core focus is to create a distinctive shopping experience that satisfies both the rational and emotional shopping needs of our DSW customers by offering them a vast, exciting assortment of in-season styles combined with the convenience and value they desire. Our DSW stores average approximately 22,000 square feet and carry approximately 24,000 pairs of shoes. We believe this combination of assortment, convenience and value differentiates us from our competitors.

Name: Sutter Health
Description:
Sutter Health's Story 

Sutter Health is a pretty big family! Actually, more than 53,000 of us—doctors, employees and volunteers—comprise our network of care. Together, we share a partnership promise to create a more personalized, high-value health care experience for you and your family. It’s called We Plus You. Take a look at how we’re partnering with you, communities and each other to make a positive difference in more than 100 Northern California cities and towns.

Name: Kinesso
Loction: Headquarters in New York, United States
Description: Kinesso brings together the best minds in data, technology and media activation to deliver seamless data-driven marketing solutions. As a technology-enabler, Kinesso powers marketing systems through a proprietary suite of applications that integrate ad tech and martech. Kinesso’s application framework spans audience, planning and activation, delivering insights and business outcomes for leading global brands. Kinesso will offer a global footprint across 38 offices providing coverage to 70+ markets. Learn more at www.kinesso.com.

Name: Virgin Atlantic
Description:
Since Virgin Atlantic was founded in 1984, we've become the UK's second largest carrier, flying from London to many of the world's major cities including New York, Los Angeles, Hong Kong, Delhi and Johannesburg. 

We don’t do ordinary. We prefer to leave the run-of-the-mill, the so-so and the average to others. Our business is about delivering the dazzling, serving up the spectacular and making the most marvellous memories - for every customer. 

Which is where our people make the difference.

Everyone that works here - be they front of house or behind the scenes - has an important part to play in creating the Virgin Atlantic experience. That's why we look for talented people, with ideas and energy; passion and personality. People like us who believe if a job's worth doing it's worth doing well. And then some.

Name: MarketStar
Description:
Rated as a Top Workplace the last five years in a row, MarketStar employs over 1,500 people across 60+ countries and is headquartered in Ogden, UT. Our employees are our greatest asset. We look for professionals who are eager to learn, grow, and perform for the clients we represent. With a culture of success and an empowered, tech savvy workforce, MarketStar continuously delivers great experiences to our employees and our clients every day. Our employees have helped launch, sell, and support thousands of products and services on behalf of some of the most innovative tech companies across the globe! 

At MarketStar, we are sales experts. We offer Sales as a Service™ to our clients by providing data-driven insights, powerful technology, and highly specialized support. This allows us to help our clients streamline their sales process, exceed sales goals, and ultimately grow their business. We have consistently delivered exceptional sales results representing our clients for over 35 years.

Name: Kaleyra
Description:
Our purpose is simple, we’re here to simplify your business communication needs. As a global player, we fuel innovation to help you serve your customers better. Our cloud based platform gives you the support you need to reach out to your customers in the best way possible, thus driving excellent customer experience. We’re aiming at helping businesses across dimensions to improve productivity and empower your overall customer satisfaction. We believe in simplicity, and our easy to use platform does the same, helping you adapt and integrate seamlessly.

We are trusted and used by over 8000 companies spanning across 10 countries to maintain and improve their business communication. Besides our headquarters in Italy, Kaleyra also maintains a technology office in India, and offices in Switzerland, United Arab Emirates and Singapore.

Name: MGM Resorts International
Description:
The resorts and casinos of MGM Resorts International™ are some of the most famous in the world. Our 28 destinations are renowned for their winning combination of quality entertainment, luxurious facilities, and exceptional customer service.

We are actively expanding our presence globally, with potential developments in a number of domestic and international markets. At MGM Resorts International, we are all striving together to deliver an enticing blend of entertainment to every corner of the world.

Name: FOX SOLUTIONS
Description:
About Fox: 
FOX Solutions was incepted in August 1995. FOX Solutions is an Engineering, Automation & IT company. FOX is present in India, Middle East, South East Asia and Canada. 
Provides end to end turnkey solutions & services.  
Provides innovative end to end solutions & services in Engineering, IA, IT, SPM (Special purpose machines).
Technology driven multi-platform & multi domain (IA) industrial automation solution provider and system integrator. One of the biggest system integrator in the country.
Has executed more than 1000 big size projects globally.

8 Delivery Centres : Nasik, Pune, Hyderabad, Kolkata, Bhubaneshwar, Silvasa, Dubai, Singapore

Our IT Products:  
Airport IT Solutions  
Plant IT - Manufacturing Execution System
Plant IT, IOT 4.0 / cloud solutions
IT products in automotive manufacturing lines
IT products based on artificial intelligence.
IT solutions in Power - Smart grid solutions
Energy Management System, SOLAR SCADA
Warehouse Management
Cargo Warehousing Solutions
Embedded IT Solutions

Name: Millennium
Description:
Millennium is a global alternative investment management firm, founded in 1989, which manages more than $58.5 billion in assets. We seek to pursue a diverse array of investment strategies across industry sectors, asset classes, and geographies.

Our four primary strategies are RV Fundamental Equity, Equities Arbitrage, Fixed Income Strategies, and Quantitative Strategies.

Name: EduGorilla
Description: EduGorilla is a one-stop community for students, faculties and Institutes. Students can find answers to their career related queries, download study material, search for Coachings, Schools or Colleges and much more.

Name: WWE
Description:
WWE, a publicly traded company (NYSE: WWE), is a multi-faceted media organization and recognized leader in global entertainment. The Company consists of a portfolio of businesses that create and deliver original content 52 weeks a year to a global audience. 
 
WWE is committed to family-friendly entertainment on its television programming, pay-per-view, digital media and publishing platforms. WWE’s TV-PG programming can be seen in more than 900 million homes worldwide in 28 languages through world-class distribution partners including NBCUniversal, FOX Sports, BT Sport, Sony India and Rogers. The award-winning WWE Network includes all live pay-per-views, scheduled programming and a massive video-on-demand library and is currently available in more than 180 countries. In the United States, NBCUniversal’s streaming service, Peacock, is the exclusive home to WWE Network. With more than one billion social media followers, the #1 sports channel on YouTube and content trending weekly on Twitter, WWE is one of the most-followed and influential brands in the world.
 
The Company is headquartered in Stamford, Conn., with offices in New York, Los Angeles, Orlando, Dubai, London, Mexico City, Mumbai, Munich, Riyadh, Shanghai, Singapore and Tokyo.

Name: Apty
Description:
Apty is a Digital Adoption Platform that helps enterprise optimize their business processes. Successful digital adoption involves both guiding people through new critical software applications and proactively pushing them to complete new processes. Only Apty combines the power of on-screen guidance with the time-saving automation of proactive process compliance. 

IT operation managers, Application Owners, VP HR/Sales, and leading CIOs alike all trust Apty to get the most out of their employees' use of web-based applications in their day-to-day job. 
Every month, nearly 1 million users use Apty to learn web-based apps and excel in their job in leading companies like Delta Airlines, Boeing, Agile CRM, and many more. 

Remember, the problem is not the software, it’s how you use it.

Name: University of Phoenix
Description:
John Sperling, PhD, a Cambridge-educated economist, professor and entrepreneur, founded University of Phoenix in 1976 in response to the changing needs of the workplace. It was part of his commitment to provide adults with the higher education they would need to fill those needs and for forty years, that’s exactly what we’ve done.

The times have changed, but our objective has remained the same – to help people enhance their lives through education. Together we will keep working to fulfill Dr. Sperling’s vision, improve the lives of our students and strengthen our communities.

We are proud to provide students access to quality education, ongoing support and a range of resources to help them succeed. Through innovation and dedication we can continue to work toward a better tomorrow..

Name: Innolabz
Description:
INNOLABZ is an organization driven to identify and bridge the so-called “GAP” that persists on every step of an individual’s career path.
Despite advancement in technology, teaching methodology & innovation, there is a void left between aspirants and real-world skills. With a motive to fill that void INNOLABZ was founded.
Gone are those times when degree, grades were considered to be the assessment criteria. The need of the hour is to foster creative and innovative thinking. Learning and innovation should work in tandem in present Indian society, and for this, INNOLABZ being the catalyst for direction.
At Innolabz, we develop the brains to get the best out of it. We give them the attitude to decide their altitude. The aspirants are given a platform to develop their skills and hone the one(s) they already have.

Name: WovVTech
Description:
WovV Technologies is a Business Productivity SaaS company with global footprints.

WovVTech's suite of products are now empowering users across 3000 locations in 50 countries to digitize their operations, get real time decision driven analytics and improve productivity. It counts global fortune 500 companies as its customers for SaaS products and technology services. 

 WovVTech is recognized for 

•	Top 20 Global SaaS startups recognized by CIOReview
•	Top 10 Best SaaS companies in India, as recognized by CEOInsights
•	Revolutionary Digital Transformation Company by IndustryWired
•	Go-Global Award by International Trade Council


Website: https://WovVTech.com/

Name: KGE Technologies
Description:
KGE TECHNOLOGIES PVT LTD, an ISO9001:2008 Certified private limited company registered in MCA.GOV.IN in the year 2013. We are into business from 2009, but we have registered ourselves in the year 2013. KGE Technologies deals with the web based solutions on hosting, designing and development, testing, SEO, adwords, traffic, social exchanges, custom software development.
We do provide Educational internship opportunity to students

Name: Cornershop by Uber
Description:
Cornershop by Uber is the app that connects your front door to your city's top stores in as little as 60 minutes.

Founded simultaneously in Santiago, Chile and Mexico City in 2015, we now operate in eight countries across the Americas: Chile, Mexico, Brazil, Peru, Colombia, Costa Rica, Canada, and the US.

In July 2020, Uber acquired a majority stake in the company, providing an important injection of capital that allowed us to access more resources to continue building and improving our service over the upcoming years.

Besides technology, we like food puns and are berry dedicated to providing people with an on-demand, easy-to-use, and innovative shopping experience.

Join us on our mission to deliver free time to everyone with shopping on their to-do list.

Name: University of Utah
Description:
The University of Utah has offered instruction since long before the Beehive State was a state. Founded in 1850 as the University of Deseret, the "U of U" has a total enrollment of some 29,000 undergraduate and graduate students, plus about 2,800 faculty members. It offers approximately 70 undergraduate majors, more than 40 teaching majors and minors, and some 100 graduate-level fields of study at about 20 colleges and schools; its business, science, humanities, and engineering departments are the university's largest. The University of Utah confers some 7,000 baccalaureate, master's, and doctoral degrees annually.

The University of Utah is one of the states largest employers. one of 81 Public Research 1 universities

Name: Brenntag
Description:
Brenntag is the global market leader in chemical distribution. The German based international company manages complex supply chains for both chemical manufacturers and consumers by simplifying market access to thousands of products and services. It combines a global network with outstanding local execution. Therefore, Brenntag is the industry’s most effective and preferred channel to the market for partners – really living its philosophy: “ConnectingChemistry”.

Brenntag operates a global network with more than 670 locations in 77 countries. With its global workforce of more than 17,000 employees, the company generated sales of EUR 11.8 billion in 2020.

Name: GapBridge Software Service
Description:
GapBridge is a Global Enterprise Consulting and IT Services organization, providing solutions around Enterprise Applications, Mobility, Cloud and Analytics through On-Premise as well as On-Cloud.

Our portfolio of services on Enterprise Solutions includes Design, Development & Implementation, Upgrade & Modernization, Support and Maintenance, Analytics and Reporting, Integration, Mobility, Training and Enablement, Managed Services and Resource Consulting.

Our people are our greatest asset!
We recognize that the only way to create value for our clients is through quality people. we recruit exceptional people who demonstrate character, talent and the capacity to grow, both professionally and personally.

We value diversity in talent, experience, skills and background that enhances our ability to help our clients excel. 
We are committed to continued investment in our people. with various development programs to support and nurture future leaders with multinational experience

Name: AREVA
Description: The AREVA Group has gone nuclear, and beyond (into renewable energy). The state-controlled company is involved in every step of nuclear power production. AREVA mines uranium and enriches it (under the trade name AREVA NC), and it builds nuclear reactors and services them. The company also treats and recycles used fuel. Subsidiary Canberra makes radiation detection equipment. AREVA is also developing a broad portfolio of clean energy plants (using wind energy, bioenergy, solar power, hydrogen power and other renewable sources) to complement its nuclear energy activities.

Name: AppsTek
Description:
AppsTek has over a decade of experience in providing customized, strategic IT consulting services for companies ranging from mid-size to Fortune 100 enterprises across a wide range of industry verticals. Successful implementation of various projects makes us strive to deliver end-to-end enterprise IT solutions, combining robust technologies, and without compromising on quality. Our team differentiates itself with exceptional talent, integrity and rigorous work ethic and we ask our clients to hold us accountable to the highest of standards. We engage in continuous research and development on emerging technologies to create innovative enterprise solutions. 

Client Speak: "From the start of our engagement, the AppsTek team provided an immediate increase to our Oracle Applications and DBA bench strength. With AppsTek, we’re able to better provide 24-hour support to our business."​

Name: Systems Plus Transformations
Description:
Systems Plus Transformations is a global boutique Information Technology Solution and Services Provider with customers in Europe, North America and Asia Pacific.

Our presence in India, UK, US enable us to serve our valued customer globally using near shore and offshore delivery models.

Our aspiration is simple – to align ourselves to the business transformational objectives of our customers and assist them in optimizing the transformation for their success. This ensures that our customers thrive in the changing business environment.

We offer a wide range of technology solutions and services to a diversified client base that includes corporations and public sector customers, in the areas of –

- Application Development & Maintenance
- BI & Analytics
- Enterprise Mobility
- Cloud Services
- Testing & QA
- Technology Consulting
- IT Infrastructure Services
- Digital Marketing

We build strong and powerful relations with our customers over a period of time by understanding their business. With this we help them to improve their productivity by ensuring that the Business as Usual operates in an optimised way, more faster and cost effective. At the same time keeping an eye to the future and assisting them to explore and innovate towards newer technologies and processes.

The Systems Plus team is energetic , committed , passionate to work collaboratively to deliver excellence for our customers.

We believe that our responsibility is to go beyond business and therefore we have a strong CSR program where our team devotes regular time to assist the socially and economically depressed sectors of the community in which we operate.

In conclusion, there will be many changes in the business world at the moment, but there are some things that stay the same. We’re still just as dedicated and passionate to help our customers achieve their business transformational objectives.

Name: Surgical Notes
Description:
Surgical Notes is dedicated to providing best-in-class revenue cycle solutions for the ambulatory surgery center (ASC) industry. By integrating Surgical Notes' suite of products and services, ASCs have access to an enterprise revenue cycle solution designed to maximize profitability, physician distributions, and business office efficiency. Our expert team of dedicated, experienced professionals deliver industry-leading customer service timely and effectively.

Who Are We?
We provide leading ambulatory surgery center revenue cycle solutions.
We develop cutting-edge revenue cycle technology. 
We employ dedicated professionals committed to providing superior customer support. 
We have been trusted by the largest ASC management companies and over 20,000 healthcare providers for 20-plus years.

Our Solutions
SNBilling - Complete Revenue Cycle Management Services
SNChart - Web-based Transcription and Management System
SNCoder - Full-Service Coding and Coding Audits
ScanChart ASC - Chart Automation and Document Management 

Our Solutions' Benefits
Accelerate revenue cycle processes and maximize profitability
Streamline operations while preserving familiar workflows
Reduce costs and increase physician disbursements

Name: Shimizu
Description: Shimizu provides architectural, engineering, construction, and development services for commercial, industrial, infrastructure, and residential projects around the world. One of Japan's largest general contractors, the company has worked on major projects including Tokyo's Metro subway, Singapore's Changi Airport, and the Malaysia-Singapore Bridge. Other areas of specialization range from offices and power stations to railroads and dams. Shimizu has increasingly focused on green building and urban renewal projects. Needless to say, earthquake-resistant technologies have always been a part of the company's approach. The company also provides facilities management. Shimizu was founded in 1804.

Name: Metro Bank PLC
Description:
We have a unique culture, and our colleagues love working here for lots of different reasons. Some think our people-first approach is the most exciting thing about us, while others say it’s our unstoppable enthusiasm for making Metro Bank the best place to be.

Whatever our magic ingredient, we’re very proud of who we are and what we do, as it’s completely different to anywhere else.

Our people come first
Ask anyone here what their favourite thing about Metro Bank is, and they’ll say: the people. Our culture is all about bringing the best out in our colleagues, and making sure everyone feels valued and respected, and finds friends for life. 

Diversity is our DNA
Inclusive teams make the best teams, so we’ve made sure our people come from all backgrounds. And we’ve opened our stores in a huge variety of communities across the UK, so our customers are wonderfully diverse, too.

Your location
A mix of remote and office working built around your role and your home life wherever possible, and part-time roles available.

Name: DDD
Description:
DDD Limited comprises a group of companies which between them offer a flexible, complete service to take a health and beauty product from idea to a consumer’s shopping basket.

Our operating companies are run as separate business units, but can all work together to deliver a range of services to our partners.

DDD is a family company that has been making health and beauty products for over 100 years. In that time, we’ve taken the traditional strengths of a family-owned business, and added forward-looking professional management to create a successful new breed of company.

Being a family company has, we believe, a significant positive impact on the way we work and interact.

These aren’t just words written on a company website. They are words that influence how we do business every day. Contact us to find out more.

Name: Contify
Description:
Contify is a comprehensive market and competitive intelligence platform that helps businesses track information on competitors, customers, and industry segments by enabling users to collect, curate, and share actionable
intelligence across their organization.

Name: Niveus Solutions
Description:
Niveus Solutions Pvt. Ltd. is a boot-strapped cloud engineering services organization founded by Suyog Shetty, Rashmi George, Roshan Bava, and Mohsin Khan in Karnataka, India. The roots of Niveus were sown in 2013 when the 4 founders, who come with rich experience working with companies such as Infosys, Wipro, Cognizant, and Sapient, realized they shared a common dream of building a world-class cloud engineering services company. The immense talent pool available in nearby education hubs Udupi, Manipal, and Mangalore, from where some of the country’s and the world’s brightest minds hail, convinced the Founders that their dream could turn into a reality. Niveus progressed rapidly over the years with the company making a strategic decision in 2019 to exclusively partner with Google Cloud India and scaling up to be its ‘Premier’ partner in less than 2 years and winning the 'Breakthrough Partner of the Year - Asia Pacific' award for 2020. The company now operates in multiple cities including Bengaluru, Delhi, Mumbai, and Singapore.

Niveus believes at the core of its success lies a unique empathetic approach to problem-solving; a trait embraced and imbibed by the team and articulated through its brand identity “We Solve For You”, where ‘You’ stands for all stakeholders including the customers, customer’s customer, and the team at Niveus. Today the company counts industry leaders in BFSI, Automotive, Media & Entertainment, Manufacturing, PSUs, and Digital Natives among its fast growing clientele. 

Niveus leverages cloud technologies to help enterprises with cloud consulting, app modernization, infrastructure modernization, data modernization, platform migration, cloud-native application development, cloud security, and managed services. The organization empowers enterprises with the ability to harness the power of cloud services and build resilient infrastructures that scale.

Name: Case Western Reserve University
Description: Looking for a research-oriented university? Go Western, young man (or woman)! Case Western Reserve University (CWRU) is a research school with an enrollment of about 10,000 students (more than half of whom are graduate and professional students). CWRU offers undergraduate and graduate degrees from eight schools -- business, engineering, law, arts and sciences, dentistry, social work, nursing, and medicine -- at its campus in Cleveland. The student-teacher ratio is 10:1. The university's origins date back to 1826 in the Ohio region then known as the Western Reserve of Connecticut; its current structure was formed in 1967 with the combination of neighboring Case Institute of Technology and Western Reserve University.

Name: The Video Editor
Loction: Headquarters in Newport Beach, United States

Name: Pratiti Technologies
Description:
Pratiti is an innovative Product Development company that possesses rich expertise in crafting and delivering software solutions using digital technologies. The Pratiti team helps their customers realize value, while working with integrity, certainty and insight; thus becoming the trusted technology partner in the customers digital transformation journey.

We are a Google Cloud Partner and have also been recognized by Zinnov for IoT capabilities, Siemens for IoT MindSphere platform, Frost & Sullivan as one of the Best Digital Practitioners, NASSCOM for Edge Computing & building a 'NextGen Product of the Year'.

Founded in 2015 and with a global presence in USA, India, Singapore, Germany and Switzerland, Pratiti is growing its reach to enterprises across industries. Pratiti team offers a unique blend of domain expertise along with technology craftsmanship.

We provide Equal Employment Opportunities to all employees along with several perks, inhouse engagement activities and a work culture that lets you thrive and grow exponentially in your career.  With exciting growth, comes exciting career opportunities! If working at an early stage high growth start-up excites you, then come and work at a place where innovation and teamwork come together.

Name: Softobiz Technologies
Description:
Softobiz is a global technology services company with leading capabilities in Digital Business Transformation, Product engineering and Information Technology outsourcing services that accelerate our clients’ journey to their Digital Future. 

Using a combination of digital strategy, engineering and business implementation, Softobiz helps clients execute successful end-to-end digital business transformation initiatives.

Our Vision: 

Excelling in digital product engineering and unlocking high performance through rapid innovation and collaboration.

Name: LuLu Hypermarkets
Loction: Headquarters in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates

Name: Datametica
Description:
Datametica is a world leader in Enterprise Data Warehouses migration to Cloud and in providing Big Data, and Advanced Analytics solutions. 

Datametica helps medium and large enterprises to consolidate their data into a modern data platform on the Cloud, move their Legacy Data Warehouses, Hadoop, Mainframe and ETL to the Cloud and modernize analytics capabilities.

Our services and technologies bring experience, and clarity for organizations to migrate their data services and analytics to the cloud with world-leading automation which helps in removing complexity, reducing risk and speeding migration.  

Our Big Data specialists, with the scale, expertise, flexibility, & cultural alignment understands the business, analytics, and data management imperatives of your organization.

We are honored to be a preferred migration, modernization, big data, and analytics solution provider by Google Cloud Platform, Amazon Web Services, and Microsoft Azure.

For more information visit: https://datametica.com/

Name: Ping Identity
Description:
At Ping Identity, we're changing the way people think about enterprise security technology. 

We're headquartered in Denver, Colorado, and we have offices and employees around the globe. We serve the largest, most demanding enterprises worldwide, including over half of the Fortune 100. Because even in the most complex enterprise environments, security shouldn't be a source of anxiety. It should be one of your greatest competitive advantages.

Come be part of something extraordinary!

Name: Lattice Semiconductor
Description:
Lattice Semiconductor is the low power programmable leader. We solve customer problems across the network, from the Edge to the Cloud, in the growing communications, computing, industrial, automotive and consumer markets. Our technology, long-standing relationships, and commitment to world-class support lets our customers quickly and easily unleash their innovation to create a smart, secure and connected world.

At Lattice, we: 

-	Partner with our customers to help them accelerate their strategic goals and product strategy
-	Dramatically speed up our customers’ time-to-market and increase their agility, while reducing their cost and risk
-	Empower our customers to design disruptive and differentiated products
-	Drive innovation in everything we do to help solve our customers’ most difficult challenges

Why Work at Lattice? 

We are a worldwide community of talented, smart, collaborative engineers, sales, marketing, finance, and operations specialists. Lattice is headquartered in Hillsboro, Oregon and has major operations in San Jose, California, Shanghai, China, and Manilla, Philippines, as well as sales offices in many locations across North America, Europe, and Asia. 

At Lattice we move fast to slash the time between taking action and seeing results. We take pride and find satisfaction in doing our jobs well, and we value the camaraderie that comes from working with others who share our total commitment to our customers, our shareholders and one another.

Explore career opportunities at Lattice today: www.latticesemi.com/careers and find us on social media at @latticesemi.

Name: Caprus IT
Description:
Caprus IT is an international software solutions and integration services provider that designs, develops, integrates and maintains business applications to enable enterprises to solve complex, mission-critical business problems.

Application/Product Development Outsourcing
IT Services & IT Consulting Services
Aerospace Services
Business Process Outsourcing
Quality Assurance and Control

Name: Awfis
Description:
Founded in 2015, with an ecosystem of inspirational workspaces, Awfis coworking promises a work environment where work meets life.
Our pan India network of 55 centres with over 25000 seats provides virtual offices, mobility solutions and physical office spaces located in your immediate proximity. Awfis centres are fully serviced and well-equipped with a tech enabled physical environment, available anytime, anywhere, without any monetary long term commitment.

Awfis technology platform enables users to book flexible & fixed work-desks, private cabins, meeting rooms and business centers across India on a real time basis, for a flexible period ranging from 1 hour to 1 year.
We beleive in sharing more than just space by curating myriad events, seminars, workshops and other recurrent activities that act as a platform for 1000+ companies sitting out of Awfis, to regularly interact, network and share ideas. 

We currently operate in NCR, Delhi, Gurgaon, Mumbai, Pune, Bengaluru, Hyderabad, Kolkata, with upcoming centres in Ahmedabad, Chennai, Indore, Chandigarh.

Name: Shyft
Description:
At Shyft, we are building a global health-tech platform that helps track, reverse and manage health conditions like hypertension, diabetes, PCOS, thyroid, etc. with lifestyle management. The product integrates health tracking based on wearables & diagnostics,  with full stack wellness services like Yoga, Nutrition & Exercise, to provide high impact and fast recoveries to the customers. The platform will also solve for scaling a highly personalized journey with focused communities, one to one mapping to coaches, and commerce, to show high impact to the customers.

Shyft is an early-stage heath tech platform and has recently closed its seed round of funding (USD 6 Mn), led by Binny Bansal, General Catalyst amongst others. The company is founded by experienced entrepreneurs - Pankaj Chaddah (Co-founder, Zomato) and Pooja Khanna (former Chief of Staff, Zomato). Know more about Shyft here - www.betheshyft.com

Name: DeVry University
Description:
Since our founding in 1931, DeVry University has focused on delivering a different kind of education – one based on experiential learning with real-world applications. When you join our team, you’re choosing an institution that serves students who are different, too: a diverse group of go-getters from all walks of life.

We know our colleagues are integral to the success of the institution. At DeVry, we’re guided by our culture of care, and we embrace values that teach us to care for students, ourselves, and colleagues. It’s one way we position our colleagues for success.

We are looking for engaged, caring colleagues to join our organization in serving our students. We take extra pride in our dedicated support teams, as well as our outstanding faculty members who have often worked for years in the fields that they teach. We believe all our colleagues deserve opportunities to reach their goals. Whether it’s career advancement, maintaining a healthy lifestyle, or saving for retirement, our comprehensive benefits, and professional development offerings can help you meet your goals.

If you want to be a part of an organization focused on providing high-quality education, care, and attention, we invite you to apply for a position today.

Name: Origin Learning Solutions
Description: Origin offers comprehensive learning content & technology services and products to market-leading enterprises globally, supporting them in achieving their goals by delivering result-driven digital learning solutions. Origin has served Fortune 1000 companies spanning various industry segments such as Manufacturing, Hi-tech, Healthcare, Food & Beverage, Energy, Retail, BFSI, and Education. Origin focuses on adding value to our clients’ needs through a unique combination of instructional design strategies, high-quality technology solutions, UI/UX, and innovative use of media.

Name: NewVision Software & Consultancy
Description: We are in the business for 16 years with a vision to become the top bespoke solution provider that resolves unique challenges for brands from across industry verticals. We bring cutting edge offerings and solution development skills and follow an 8-way unique approach in the development and integration cycle. We are at 6 locations across the globe and have a major delivery center in India

Name: Nest
Description:
Nest’s mission is to create a home that’s thoughtful - one that takes care of the people inside it and the world around it. The company focuses on simple, beautiful and delightful hardware, software and services. The Nest Learning Thermostat™ and Nest Energy Services keep you comfortable and address home energy consumption. The Nest Protect™ smoke and carbon monoxide alarm helps keep you safe and Nest Safety Rewards lets you save money through participating home insurance providers. Our recently announced Nest Secure alarm system is the latest edition to the Nest family, to compliment the full suite of Nest Cam security products (indoor, outdoor & IQ), to help keep an eye on your home, while you're away from home.

For more information, visit www.nest.com.

Name: Ubique Systems
Description:
We are a technology services and recruitment organization providing IT Consulting, IT Resourcing, IT Services (product innovation) and outsourcing services. We deliver exceptional and innovative solutions to our clients on a global scale.

We offer comprehensive solutions to enable our clients leverage technology, outperform their competition, and ensure steady and continuous growth. We have proven capabilities in existing and emerging technologies with extensive experience across industries.

We firmly believe that our success lies in the progress of our clients, partners and employees. Therefore, we are committed to helping organizations achieve business certainty, continuity and competitive advantage in the constantly changing marketplace in a transparent and client-centric manner. Furthermore, we are committed to staying on top of ever-changing business environments and evolve best practices in our industry.

Ubique Systems has a global presence with offices in the UK, Europe, USA, India and Singapore. We focus on providing cost-effective, innovative and customised services through our global delivery model. We firmly believe in collaboration and professional integrity, and as a result, the group has managed to grow to a strength of more than 1500 consultants worldwide.

Name: Linamar
Description: Linamar Corporation (TSX:LNR) is a diversified global manufacturing company of highly engineered products powering vehicles, motion, work and lives. The Company is made up of 2 operating segments – the Powertrain/Driveline segment and the Industrial segment, which are further divided into 4 operating groups – Machining & Assembly, Light Metal Casting, Forging and Skyjack, all world leaders in the design, development and production of highly engineered products.  The Company’s Machining & Assembly, Casting and Forging operating groups focus on precision metallic components, modules and systems for engine, transmission, driveline and body systems designed for global vehicle and industrial markets. With more than 23,000 employees in 56 manufacturing locations, 6 R&D centers and 15 sales offices in 17 countries in North and South America, Europe and Asia, Linamar generated sales of $5.2 billion in 2015.

Name: Development Dimensions International
Description:
DDI works with organizations around the world to hire, build and retain strong leaders at every level. We believe that better leadership is not only about a better workplace. It’s about better communities and, ultimately, a better future for us all. 

Our 1,100 associates work side-by-side with clients across 93 countries to build a pipeline of leaders to meet today’s—and tomorrow’s—business challenges. The company serves customers in industries such as manufacturing, health care, technology, finance, and telecommunications. William Byham and Douglas Bray founded DDI in 1970.

Name: Cambay Consulting
Description: Cambay is a US based Leading IT consulting, Cloud Infrastructure, Fintech, Engineering, Healthcare, Offshore Software Development & Workforce management services company. Cambay provides world-class strategic IT leadership and hyper-efficient IT operational support, enabling our global client-base to grow and transform their businesses.

Name: Vanderbilt University
Description:
At Vanderbilt University, our work - regardless of title or role - is in service to an important and noble mission in which every member of our community serves in advancing knowledge and transforming lives on a daily basis. Located in Nashville, Tennessee, on a 330  acre campus and arboretum dating back to 1873, Vanderbilt is proud to have been named as one of “America’s Best Large Employers” as well as a top employer in Tennessee and the Nashville metropolitan area by Forbes for several years running. We welcome those who are interested in learning and growing professionally with an employer that strives to create, foster, and sustain opportunities as an employer of choice through:

- Working and growing together as a community of communities... we are One Vanderbilt.
- Providing a work environment where every staff and faculty member can be their authentic and best self, while providing the resources and opportunities to learn and grow.
- Encouraging development, collaboration, and partnership both internally and externally while fostering the value that every member of the Vanderbilt community can lead and grow regardless of title or position.

We understand you have a choice when choosing where to work and pursue a career. We understand you are unique and have a story. We want to hear it. We encourage you to apply today so that you might become a part of our story.

Name: Tech Prescient
Description:
Tech Prescient is a premium Software Product Development Services company, deeply passionate about customer success! Quality and Customer Delight is at the core of everything we do.

We have core expertise in the following areas:

- Product Development Engineering: Product Design, Development, Deployment and Support using Industry best practices. Expertise in the entire process right from UX/Design, Architecture, Development, QA and Deployment with right choice of design and technology across various tiers.

- BI, Analytics, ML and AI: Data discovery, Ingestion, Orchestration, Quality and Automation. Managing data at scale at rest or in-motion. Data governance and access management. Data Insights and Data Visualization. Machine Learning, Auto ML, NLP for text analysis, model building for classification, regression and clustering.

- Cloud Computing, Infra and DevOps: Building and deploying Secured and Scalable multi-tenant or hybrid applications and products ‘born in the cloud’. Expertise in hosting infrastructures and AWS in-particular with a thorough understanding of AWS Cloud Services and DevOps processes with considerations to Security, access controls and Authentication protocols.
 
- Mobile Computing: Building enterprise grade mobile apps with emphasis on user experience to deliver value and drive adoption.

What differentiates us is our obsession with the quality of work we produce. Customers work with us because of our technical expertise, transparent and agile processes and unflinching attention to details in our work. Client success is at the core of what we do. 

We partner with our clients at all stages including ideation, design, development, testing, deployment and support.

Name: Softuvo Solutions
Description:
Softuvo is an ISO Certified Organization

ISO 9001:2015, Quality Management
ISO 27001:2013, Information security management

We are a creative & innovative IT consulting, services and support company, offering our excellence in web design, app development and custom business solutions
Moving ahead, WE ARE INTERIM CTO. We Build Apps for startups; Working with new ideas and start-ups is our passion. Not work! We are fully loaded with the experience
that can help any brand surpass any hurdle in reaching target market online. 

For this we invest heavily in our employees to support our core competencies in the areas of:

> Custom Application Development
> Multi-tier Client/Server Applications
> Mobile Application Development (Android, iOS)
> Website Development
> Digital Marketing

We Provide Consultancy > We design > We develop > We deliver  > We Support

Name: Spencer Stuart
Description: When the board of directors ousts your CEO for running the company into the ground, it might look to SSI (U.S.) -- more commonly known as Spencer Stuart Management Consultants -- for a replacement. Founded in 1956, the firm offers leadership consulting and executive search services, specializing in searches for top-level executives and board directors. Clients hire Spencer Stuart to recruit the best chief executives and functional leaders in such areas as finance, human resources, information technology, legal, and marketing. The firm operates from 50 offices worldwide. Citing the desire to protect client confidentiality, the firm's partners have declined to follow rivals into the public marketplace.

Name: ICRA Analytics
Description:
ICRA Analytics Ltd, a wholly-owned subsidiary of ICRA Ltd, provides solutions, analytics and digital platforms for risk management, market data, consulting and knowledge services.

ICRA Analytics Ltd is the amalgamated entity of ICRA Online Ltd and ICRA Management Consulting Services Ltd, both wholly-owned subsidiaries of ICRA Ltd. With more than 20 years of experience and a pool of 600  full-time professionals, we able to leverage knowledge, experience and technology to add value to our clients.

We are an ISO 9001:2015 and ISO 27001:2013 certified company.

Name: SABESP
Description: Companhia de Saneamento Básico do Estado de São Paulo is Brazil's largest water company, serving more than 26 million people. The state-controlled utility, known as SABESP, provides water services and waste water services to 60% of the population of the state of São Paulo. The company's service territory consists of more than 370 municipalities (out of the state's total of 645) including those in the São Paulo metropolitan region. SABESP also sells water wholesale to other municipalities in the state. The government of the state of São Paulo controls SABESP.

Name: MyKaarma
Description:
We believe in changing the future of transportation, one interaction at a time.
Working at myKaarma is about following the fundamental tenet of "Customer first". Our culture of high performance employees exhibit good judgment and are accountable for their results. This also fuels our “innovate or die” mantra. As a result, we deliver effective customer service, high level of results, and maintain a healthy work-life balance.

Why?
We believe simple and transparent interactions with customers inspires trust and long‐term loyalty!

How?
We do that by building simple, secure, scalable, and fault-tolerant systems that integrate naturally into day-to-day business, backed by a fanatical group of employees who genuinely care about their customer’s success.

What?
We deliver best in class communications and payment software for Automotive Dealers!

Name: Cruise
Description:
We're a self-driving car service designed for the cities we love. Our all-electric self-driving fleet has the potential to save millions of lives, reshape our cities, reduce harmful emissions, give back billions of hours of time and restore freedom of movement for everyone. 

Our vehicles are on the road in California, Arizona, and Michigan navigating some of the most challenging and unpredictable driving environments. They encounter thousands of unique  and complex traffic situations that we analyze carefully to ensure safety and reliability.

Name: Axelon
Description: For more than 30 years, Axelon has been exceeding market expectations and delivering top talent to the Fortune 500. Our team’s dedication and commitment to our clients’ success have always set us apart. Axelon continues to empower its employees with technological advancements developed for top business performance, making Axelon a leading global staffing services provider in the industry. Historically rooted in the technology sector, Axelon now services many labor categories. At Axelon, you’ll be part of a team that accelerates business success.

Name: UC Irvine
Description: Sun, the beach, Nobel Prize winners, and a Southern California location, what more could you want in a university? The University of California, Irvine (UCI) has more than 27,000 students, 1,800 faculty members, and 8,900 staff. UCI was founded in 1965 and built on land donated by The Irvine Company, which developed the residential community surrounding the school. It offers 69 undergraduate degree programs, 45 master's degree programs, and 40 doctoral programs, as well as an MD and two EdDs. Serving the community and training its medical doctors, the UCI Medical Center -- a not-for-profit hospital -- and its affiliated clinics handle about 600,000 outpatient visits a year.

Name: Jet2.com and Jet2holidays
Description:
Jet2.com, the North's leading leisure airline, provides Friendly low fares and Jet2holidays offers Package holidays you can trust. 

Jet2.com's first flight was to Amsterdam from Leeds Bradford Airport in February 2003. We now have a fleet of over 50 aircraft, operating more than 150 routes across Europe and beyond, providing great value flights to over five million Customers annually. Our bases are currently Leeds Bradford, Manchester, Glasgow, Newcastle, Edinburgh, East Midlands, Belfast and Alicante. As we continue to expand, our award-winning airline is still famed for its friendly service.

Jet2holidays was launched in 2007 and reaches new heights every year. With almost one million customers in 2013 alone, we are now the third largest holiday operator in the UK. We offer a wide range of package holidays to over 40 city and sun destinations with more than 1,800 hotels and apartments to choose from. Ultimately, our goal is to make every Customer's holiday one to remember.

Name: Endemol Shine Group
Description: Endemol Shine Group is a global content creator, producer and distributor with a portfolio of international hits including Big Brother, Black Mirror, Deal or No Deal, Humans, Hunted, MasterChef, Mr. Bean, The Biggest Loser, The Island, Spelling Star, Your Face Sounds Familiar and many more. Endemol Shine Group’s businesses have creative operations in over 30 markets, with a diverse portfolio of over 600 revenue generating formats across scripted and non-scripted genres, alongside digital, gaming, and distribution operations.

Name: Smytten
Description: Smytten is currently available on iOS and android platforms and on the web (smytten.com). Deep profiling of consumers is done based on a proprietary algorithm before allowing them to access the app. Once in, the consumer has the luxury to discover and try premium products. In addition, can buy the products as well. Hence offering seamless pre-purchase to purchase journey to the consumer. The product is equipped with an intelligent predictive behavioural model that decides the user’s interest and affinity continuously and curated the products in the feed accordingly. There is work in progress on machine learning algorithms and AI-enabled chatbots for a more immersive consumer experience on the platform. Also, the platform is integrated with a native advertising engine that pushes ads in the user feed in a non-intrusive way.

Name: Financial Times
Description:
The Financial Times (FT) is one of the world’s leading news organisations, recognised globally for its authority, integrity and accuracy. The FT provides a broad range of essential services, including news, comment, data and analysis, to a growing audience of internationally minded professionals.

The FT group comprises of the FT newspaper and FT.com, Financial Publishing, FT Chinese, FT Labs, Medley Global Advisors (MGA), ExecSense and the New York Institute of Finance.

The Financial Times is distributed in about 25 cities worldwide and claims a readership of about 2.1 million. In the UK and Ireland, the paper boasts a circulation of more than 100,000. Financial Times Group also distributes news online.

Name: Causeway Technologies
Description: Piles of paper will never become building materials if left to Causeway Technologies. The company makes information technology systems for the construction industry. Customers use its systems to estimate, price, and invoice construction projects. Causeway offers modules for collaboration, document and project management, reporting, and supply chain. Customers of the company include major construction and engineering players such as Skanska, Balfour Beatty, Carillion, Taylor Woodrow, and Tube Lines. CEO Phil Brown founded Causeway Technologies in 1999.

Name: Brainstorm Force
Description:
We are Brainstorm Force

A team of passionate hackers, designers, writers, marketers, artists, and creators, we, at Brainstorm are an energetic bunch of professionals striving to deliver the best. Everyone among us is smarter than the other and our fun-loving culture helps us think and do things differently.

Name: Acara Solutions
Description: Acara Solutions India Private Limited is an award-winning staffing and recruiting firm offering a full range of customized talent solutions, including contingent staffing, direct placement, payrolling, contract-to-direct, executive search, and recruitment process outsourcing. We are headquartered in Chennai with a regional office in Bangalore and a presence in Pune. Acara serves as a trusted staffing partner to companies across all industries. Acara is part of Aleron, a group of companies that have been delivering workforce and business solutions for more than 60 years. At Acara India, we bring top talent to you. For more information, please visit acarasolutions.in.

Name: Chuck E. Cheese
Description:
CEC Entertainment, LLC ("CEC"), headquartered in Irving, Texas is the nationally recognized leader in family entertainment and dining with its Chuck E. Cheese, Peter Piper Pizza brands and virtual kitchen concept, Pasqually's Pizza & Wings.

As the place where half a million happy birthdays are celebrated every year, Chuck E. Cheese's goal is to create positive, lifelong memories for families through fun, food, and play and is the place Where A Kid Can Be A Kid®. Committed to providing a fun, safe environment, Chuck E. Cheese helps protect families through industry-leading programs such as Kid Check®. As a strong advocate for its local communities, Chuck E. Cheese has donated more than $19 million to schools through its fundraising programs. Peter Piper Pizza features dining, entertainment and carryout with a neighborhood pizzeria feel and "pizza made fresh, families made happy" culture.

Peter Piper Pizza takes pride in delivering quality food and fun that reconnects family and friends. Created in 2020, Pasqually’s Pizza & Wings offers a distinct, customized eating experience outside of a restaurant environment that amplifies classic pizza and wings and operates out of 400 ghost locations nationwide. The Company and its franchisees operate a system of nearly 600 Chuck E. Cheese and more than 120 Peter Piper Pizza venues, with locations in 47 states and 17 foreign countries and territories.

Name: Curvature
Description:
Curvature, a Park Place Technologies company, is transforming the way customers procure their hardware. At a time of competing IT priorities, companies need to be nimble, efficient and smart with their spend. Putting budget toward technology upgrades that give you a significant increase in performance while maintaining assets that are working is a winning strategy for your IT infrastructure and your bottom line. A strategic partner for more than 15,000 organizations globally, we specialize in delivering 24/7 global technical support, advanced hardware replacement, and complete lifecycle management of networking and data center equipment under one global contract from locations in the Americas, Europe, and Asia.

https://www.curvature.com/company/about-curvature

Name: Mirraw
Loction: 7, Kumtha St, Ballard Estate, Fort, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400001
Description:
With over 5 lac listed products, 5 million+ customers worldwide, our mission is to bring the world's best ethnic designs to your doorstep with handpicked designs in ethnic jewelry, apparels, accessories & more

Founded in 2011, our products make customers look incredible. With a great fan following in India, US & Europe, Mirraw is focused on ethnic wear and has plans to dominate this space in the coming years

Shailesh Jain, a first gen. entrepreneur with a keen interest in marketing & technology. After completing his bachelor’s in computer technology from VJTI, he moved on the US to complete his Masters from Carnegie Mellon University. The urge towards entrepreneurship and the promising story of India made him come back & start Mirraw.com with his friend

Anup Nair, after completing his bachelor’s in engineering from VJTI, Anup worked for Microsoft on on some very interesting projects for over 3 years

The entrepreneurial bug + the promise that India holds led both eventually start Mirraw.com

Name: OSP Labs
Description:
Founded in 2009, OSP Labs is a solution driven innovation lab delivering experiences for next-gen startups and enterprises at the forefront of technology. Think of us as a ‘problem-solvers’ with coming-of-age solution to improve businesses at every level. 
From enterprise mobility system to custom software that streamlines your workflow, our energetic team hustle every day to make digital dreams come true for our clients. We partner with startups, incubate ideas and experiment new technologies to engage, drive innovation, and promote successful environment. 
Our process is collaborative effort touching every corner of the technology and adapting to client’s evolving needs.

Name: Alpha Net
Description: Alpha Net is the IT services company offering solutions to complex business problems through the use of technology, outsourced product development, web applications competencies along with project management services using a global delivery model from onsite/offshore center. We deliver a broad portfolio of services to clients in the manufacturing, financial services, biotech, healthcare, and communications with a team committed to deliver innovation.

Name: StraViso
Description: StraViso is a technology solutions company delivering accelerated business value to its customers using its AI-powered platforms for collaboration and communication in enterprise environments through unmatched combination of information, innovation, and technology expertise.

Name: TEST COMPANY _ DO NOT APPLY!
Loction: Headquarters in San Francisco, United States

Name: Appointy
Description:
Who are we?
We at Appointy are on a mission to help professionals and organizations around the world save time and boost their productivity. Over 200,000 customers around the world, ranging from leading tech organizations and public institutions to small businesses in developed markets, love and trust our scheduling solutions. We are expanding our horizons and building a platform that could transform the way developers work. It is a low-code SaaS development platform, called SaaStack, that’ll help developers build applications in the least amount of time!

What makes Appointy a great place to work?
At Appointy, you can drive tremendous career growth while helping professionals and organizations across the world significantly boost their productivity. We take our Culture very seriously and are driven by a set of Company Values that guide our decisions and actions. We are passionate, curious, and creative people, who strive for excellence and seek challenging assignments in a highly collaborative and fun work environment. 

What do we offer?
As a startup, we’re flexible, agile, and we love to learn. We value diversity in our team and ideas, and are an equal opportunity employer. You’ll be working towards solving meaningful problems, and gain hands-on experience with the latest technologies and tech stack during a phase of hyper-growth at the company. 

We are soon shifting to our new office - a modern workspace with amenities like a fully catered cafeteria, swimming pool, indoor badminton court, table tennis, pool, guest house, and our very own on-campus outdoor go-karting track. For select roles, we do offer work from home provisions as well. 

Our team loves to hang out together, and we ensure that it happens via regular meetups - in Bhopal as well as during our national and international offsites. 

If you’re someone who aspires to do impactful work alongside equally motivated, talented and supportive peers; take on meaningful challenges that enhance your learning; and accelerate your career growth, Appointy is just the right place for you. 

We’re hiring for a variety of tech roles, check them out at https://www.linkedin.com/company/appointyindia/jobs/ or directly reach out to us at careers@appointy.com, and we’ll get back to you ASAP.

Name: Moshi Moshi
Loction: 8/12, Honnam Complex, South cross road, basavangudi

Name: Anixter International
Description: At Anixter, we enable the connected world. From securer facilities and communities, to more efficient networks and industrial environments, we deliver the infrastructure solutions—and intelligence—that sustain your business. Through our superior product offerings, unmatched global distribution network, expert supply chain management and technical know-how, we drive efficiency and effectiveness to benefit your bottom line.

Name: PCS Global Tech
Description:
In a world where technology is king, bright minds savvy in the latest market trends and systems are necessary to drive the global economy. PCS Global Tech is a part of an information organization that specializes in training the technological minds of the future. 

Our Talent Development Program is a technical "boot camp" which will give students the skills necessary to become a part of the workforce in information technologies. Not only do we cultivate knowledge and skillsets, we hand deliver the tools essential for success!

Name: Sarla Technologies
Description:
Sarla Technologies is an ISO 9001:2008 and CSIA certified global engineering house. With over 15 years of experience, we have extensive expertise in the area of Automation and Plant IT Solutions, such as Industrial Automation, Manufacturing Intelligence and Integration, Plant Data Reporting and Analytics.

Through our Global Engineering Services we cater to global Automation Companies, System Integrator, EPC, OEM and Process Consultants in providing engineering and start up services across diverse industry verticals. Through our well established global delivery model and robust quality procedures we have deployed several projects in the USA, Europe, Asia, Middle East, South Africa and Australia.

Our ‘Products & Solutions’ division provides production management and plant intelligence solutions that help manufacturers connect and integrate their shop floor to top floor, thus providing real time visibility.

Name: CyberArk
Description:
CyberArk is trusted by the world’s leading organizations, including more than 50 percent of the Fortune 500, to protect against external attackers and malicious insiders. 

CyberArk pioneered the market and remains the leader in securing enterprises against cyber attacks that take cover behind insider privileges to attack critical enterprise assets. Today, only CyberArk delivers a new category of targeted security solutions that help leaders stop reacting to cyber threats and get ahead of them, preventing attack escalation before irreparable business harm is done. 

With offices and authorized partners worldwide, CyberArk is a vital security partner to more than 7,500 global businesses, including: 
•	More than 50% of the Fortune 500 
•	More than 35% of the Global 2000

Name: Belong
Description:
Belong helps organizations discover, engage and hire top, relevant talent at the right time. Our data-driven solution helps hiring teams spot candidates who best fit their requirements and are most inclined to move, and engage with them through personalized interactions.

Over the last year, we have worked with some of the fastest-growing companies in India, helping them hire for high-impact positions across critical functions. And, of course, we are using Belong to build our own awesome team!

If you want to see how we can help transform your hiring, sign up for a demo with us.

Name: Texila Educational and Management Services
Description:
Texila Educational & Management Services Pvt. Ltd. is working to increase the number of talented people seeking and finding employment in the education industry. TEMS is aiming to attract people to career opportunities, to Up skill people who are both entering and working in the industry and to employ more high caliber people in the grains industry. 

At TEMS, we believe that technology should simplify businesses, not complicate them; it is this philosophy that has been the driving force behind all our innovations and product developments.

Name: Cognex
Description:
Cognex machines see what mere mortals cannot. 

As a company, we are one of the world's largest producers of systems that, linked to a video camera, serve as eyes where human vision is insufficient. Semiconductor, consumer goods, health care, and automotive companies, among others, use the company's machine vision systems to position and identify products, gauge sizes, and locate defects.

Cognex is the leader in Advanced Industrial Machine Vision with over $1 Billion Dollars in revenue, 40 + years of experience, 1 Million systems sold, and 60+ global locations.

We also celebrate our values every day! Cognoids (otherwise known as a highly skilled and highly motivated member of the Cognex team) are customer-centric. We believe in excellence, perseverance, and creativity. We’re proud of what we do, and the integrity with which we do it.

Name: HM Group
Loction: # 14, HM Geneva House, Cunningham Road, Bangalore- 53

Name: Imperva
Description: Imperva is the cybersecurity leader whose mission is to protect data and all paths to it. Customers around the world trust Imperva to protect their applications, data and websites from cyber attacks. With an integrated approach combining edge, application security and data security, Imperva protects companies through all stages of their digital journey. Imperva Research Labs and our global intelligence community enable Imperva to stay ahead of the threat landscape and seamlessly integrate the latest security, privacy and compliance expertise into our solutions.

Name: Adjust
Description:
Adjust is the mobile marketing analytics platform trusted by growth-driven marketers around the world, with solutions for measuring and optimizing campaigns and protecting user data. Adjust powers thousands of apps with built-in intelligence and automation, backed by responsive global customer support. 

Adjust is a subsidiary of AppLovin (Nasdaq: APP), the leading growth platform for developers. Learn more about Adjust at www.adjust.com.

Facebook https://www.facebook.com/adjustcom
Twitter https://twitter.com/adjustcom  @adjustcom
LinkedIn https://www.linkedin.com/company/adjustcom
Instagram https://www.instagram.com/adjustcom/

Name: Dtdc Courrier and Cargo
Loction: Headquarters in Dubai, United Arab Emirates

Name: Citrin Cooperman
Description: We are a top-25 nationally recognized full-service assurance, tax, and advisory firm with offices conveniently located throughout the Northeast. Since 1979, we have steadily built our business by helping companies and high net worth individuals find smart solutions. Whether your operations and assets are located around the corner or across the globe, we can provide new perspectives on strategies that will help you achieve your short- and long-term goals.

Name: Arrk
Description:
DO YOU FEEL THAT YOUR TALENTS ARE NOT BEING USED?
Come and join an exciting IT Services business where your contribution  REALLY make a DIFFERENCE!
Arrk Group is an award winning global IT services company specialising in the design, build and ongoing operational management of complex web and mobile applications across multiple commercial sectors. Headquartered in Manchester UK with the benefit of an impressive CMMI certified delivery & operations centre on the Millennium Business Park, Mumbai, Arrk has developed a unique and innovative approach to the creation of web and mobile software applications that continues to provide its Customers with extremely high quality IT services. Achieving this has only been made possible through Arrk’s incredibly talented, committed and enthusiastic people.

Working at Arrk is different from most IT services companies. We believe that every member of the team has unique skills and personality. We treat everyone with respect and understand that there needs to be genuine harmony between both work and life. Here at Arrk, everyone is treated as one of the family and everyone has the power to make a real difference in all aspects of their life - for the company and their own personal development. If you are working for a large IT business currently then you’ll appreciate that this is a refreshing change!

But don’t let our family approach make you think that Arrk isn’t a challenging and exciting place to work. Far from it. We offer the best of both worlds – a caring approach AND rewarding, challenging assignments. We’ve delivered high quality, innovative solutions to some of the largest UK and global brands. We also provide essential services to smaller businesses that have great ideas for the future. No matter what the opportunity, Arrk has exceeded customer expectations. Our work has been recognized throughout the UK, having won numerous prestigious awards, the most recent being the nationally recognized British Computer Society and Computer Weekly National IT awards.
